headline: Yegereyegere "Kwa Siyoni": Abajejwe iryo soko ntibavuga rumwe n'abarikoreramwo
text: Abadandariza mw'isoko rya Bujumbura City Market rizwi nko kwa Siyoni barahagaritse ibikorwa vyabo kuva kuri uyu wa kabiri biyamiriza iduzwa ry'amahera yo kuriha ibibanza bakoreramwo  gushika ku ncuro zibiri. Ariko abajejwe iryo soko, bavuga yuko ukwo kuduza ibiciro kwari gukenewe uravye ibihe tugezemwo n'uburyo bwakoreshejwe mu kuvugurura isoko. Umupfasoni umwe muri abo badandaza bavuganye na BBC atashimye kwivuga izina, avuga ko bandikiwe amakete abamenyesha ko kuva itariki 10 z'ukwezi kwa mbere 2022 amahera bahora bariha yadugijwe incuro zibiri. Agira ati: "Batumenyesheje ko kubera ibikorwa vyakozwe muri iryo soko, ko kuva mu kwezi kwa mbere amahera twahora turiha azohinduka. Akarorero abahora bariha ibihumbi 400 ku kwezi bazoriha ibihumbi 750, abahora bariha na bo 188.800 bakazoriha 312.000. Urumva ko bagwijije incuro zibiri zirenga." Ivyo bikorwa bivugwa vyakozwe ngo ni nko kwubaka ahahagarara imiduga, gusiga isima hasi hamwe n'amabombo (robine) azana amazi mu ntumbero yo kwikingira ikiza Covid-19. Abadandariza muri  iyo soko bavuga ko batanka ko ibiciro vyoduga, ariko bagasaba ko habanza kuba inama n'ingingo. BBC yashoboye kuvugana n'uburongozi bw'iryo soko, uwitwa Joseph Dukundane atubwira yuko baravye igihe cari kihaciye amahera ataduzwa kandi ibintu vyarazimvye, hamwe n'ibikorwa vyo kuvugurura isoko baranguye, ngo ukwo kuduza ibiciro kwari gukenewe: Kanda ngaha wumve ico kiganiro.

headline: Abaguzi b'ibinyobwa vya Brarudi mu Burundi basaba guhumurizwa
text: Nyuma y'aho leta ivugiye ko atacatitutse mu buryo ishirahamwe Brarudi rihingura ibinyobwa vyaryo, ababifata amakenga ntarahera kuko akanovera katakiri kakandi. Ikigo ca leta y'u Burundi kijejwe kugenzura ubuziranenge bw'ibidandazwa, BBN giheruka kumenyesha ko naho akanovera k'ibinyobwa vya Brarudi koba katakiri nka mbere, ngo ntacatitutse ku buryo bihingurwa. Ariko abafata ivyo binyobwa ntibashize amakenga, imyidogo ikaba ikiri ya yindi mu gihe bobo bafashe ivyo binyobwa bumva neza ko "bitakiryoshe" nka mbere. Haca rero haza umwitwarariko wo kumenya niba ivyo binyobwa bisa n'ivyahindutse ata ngaruka vyobagirako naho leta isa n'iyihumuriza. Umukuru w'ishirahamwe ry'abaguzi mu Burundi, Pierre Nduwayo, yabwiye BBC ko vyumvikanye ko ivyo binyobwa bifise icahindutse. Yagize ati: "Biboneka mu nzoga, twaratanguye kuvyumva cane cane nko muri za Royale (Amstel), hamwe n'amafana. "Ivyo n'imbere y'uko umushikiranganji abishikiriza imyidogo y'abaguzi twari tumaze kuyumva. Kandi na twebwe ubisomye urumva ko akanovera kahahora gasa n'akahindutse." Bwana Nduwayo yabandanije avuga ko Brarudi mu bisanzwe yahora inyaruka mu gushikiriza ibijanye n'ibinyobwa vyayo ariko ko ubu ataco iravuga. Yagize ati: "Brarudi twari dusazanzwe tuzi ko ari ishirahmwe rikunda kuza riramenyesha ibintu vyabo aho bihagaze n'ubwo hoba hari ingorane bakazishikiriza. "Ariko kuva iyo myidogo itanguye bari mu gacerere ntangere, ni naco gituma twovuga duti ahubwo nibave muri ako gacerere  bashikirize nabo kuri ayo magenga abaguzi boba bafise..." Uwo aserukiye abaguzi yabandanije avuga ko naho leta ivuga ko ata ngorane zihara, akanovera gafise akamaro kanini mu gutuma abaguzi bahurumbira ikidandazwa ico ari co cose. Rero ngo naho boba bababwira ko ata ngorane kandi bumva ako kanovera karahindutse, ntibibuza ko bagira amakenga.

headline: Ibanki nkuru y’u Burundi igabisha amashirahamwe acuruza amafaranga atisunze amategeko
text: Umuyobozi w'igisata kijejwe kugenzura amabanki mw'ibanki nkuru y'igihugu c'u Burundi, Prosper Ngendanganya, asaba amashirahamwe acuruza amafaranga kwubahiriza amategeko yashinzwe n'ibanki nkuru y'igihugu. Ni inyuma y'umubonano hagati y'iyo banki n'amashirahamwe agura akagurisha amafaranga wabaye  ku munsi wa kane w'iyi ndwi mu ntumbero y'ukwibutsa ayo mashirahamwe amategeko mashasha n'igituma adakurikizwa. Ku wa 17 z'ukwezi kw'icenda uno mwaka, ibanki nkuru y'igihugu, BRB, yasohoye itegeko rishasha rigenga urucuruza rw'amafaranga mu ntumbero y'ukurwanya abikika mu kiza bakagura bakanagurisha ku biciro vy'umurengera amafaranga y'agaciro. Mw'itangazo yasohoye ejo ku wa gatanu, bwana Ngendakumana yaragabishije ko amashirahamwe n'amazu acuruza amafaranga y'agaciro adakurikije amategeko azofatwa nk'ayahungabanya umutekano w'igihugu. Avuga ko ishirahamwe rizofatwa ririko riragurisha ibiciro ry'ishakiye ko rizofatwa nk'umwansi w'igihugu kandi ko rizohanwa hisunzwe igatabu mpanavyaha. Ibanki nkuru y'igihugu imenyesha kandi ko urudandazwa rutemewe n'amategeko (marché noir) rw'amafaranga y'agaciro rwasubiye kwibonekeza cane cane mu gisagara ca Bujumbura. BRB ikababazwa n'uko ayo mashirahamwe adashaka gufasha mu kwerekana abo badandaza bo mu kinyegero bakora batubahiriza ibiciro biba vyashinzwe na BRB. Mu rugamba rwo kurwanya urudandazwa ruteye kubiri n'amategeko, ibanki nkuru y'igihugu yaremereye agashirukabute umuntu azoshobora kwerekana ishirahamwe canke inzu izogura canke izogurisha amafaranga y'agaciro hatisunzwe iryo tegeko rishasha, aho azoronswa ibihumbi 500 vy'amafaranga y'amarundi. Ni mu gihe uwuzokwerekana umuntu canke ishirahamwe rikora ritazwi n'ibanki nkuru y'igihugu nawe azorosnwa ibice 10 kw'ijana (10%) vy'amafaranga yose azoba afashwe. Kuva Uburundi bwinjiye mu ngorane za politike mu mwaka wa 2015, ibihugu bimwe bimwe vyahora bifasha u Burundi vyahagaritse imfashanyo vyahora biha ico gihugu, ivyagize ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bwaco, bituma kani amafaranga y'agaciro akena.

headline: Umunsi wahariwe abagore: Mu Burundi ngo baraciye akenge ko kwishira hamwe
text: Mu gihe isi yaraye ihimbaje umunsi mpuzamakungu wahariwe guharanira uburenganzira bw'abakenyezi n'iterambere ryabo, muri iyi ndwi turacihweza aho isemo igeze kuri iki kibazo c'uburinganire ku burenganzira hagati y'abagabo n'abagore. Mu Burundi, abagore ngo baramaze guca akenge ko kwishira hamwe mu migwi yo gukorera hamwe, bikabatuma kuronka umutahe no kugwiza umwimbu n'ubwo ibibazo bitabuze. Kimwe mu bibazo nyamukuru bisigaye ni ihohotera rifatiye ku gitsina, aho mu ntara zigera kuri 19, harangwa ibigo bitatu gusa bishobora kwakira no gufasha mu buryo bwa mbere abakorewe ayo mabi. Ariko rero ngo ibintu biriko birahinduka mu nzira nziza. Ivyo Florentine Kwizera yabibwiwe n'uwujejwe umugambi w'iterambere ridakumira mw'ishirahamwe ACORD Burundi, Mme Sophie Havyarimana (umviriza ikiganiro aho hejuru ukanze kw'ifoto)

headline: Ubutunzi bwa Ethiopia burabangamiwe n'intambara ya Tigray
text: Intambara y'imbere muri Ethiopia imaze amezi 10, imaze guhitana abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi, abaharurwa muri za miriyoni barata izabo abandi na bo bari mu kaga  aho bakeneye imfashanyo. Ariko ivyo si vyo vyonyene imaze kwonona ku gihugu kiza ubugira kabiri mu kubamwo abantu benshi muri Afrika - intambara imaze kwonona vyinshi no mu butunzi, bishobora gufata imyaka n'iyindi kugira bisanurwe. Ku mugwa mukuru Addis - Ababa, Tigist w'imyaka 26, atashimye ko amazina yiwe yose akoreshwa, avuga ko amafaranga akoresha ku kwezi ku kwezi ubu yigwije na kabiri kubera imvo zibiri: intambara yadutse muri Tigray mu kwezi kwa cumi  na rimwe hamwe n'ikiza ca coronavirus. Avuga ati: "Imbere y'intambara na Covid, nakoresha birr 1.000 (nk'ama dorari 22) buri kwezi mu gusuma ivyo guteka. Ubu nkoresha birr 2.000". "Ubu ibintu birazimvye gusumba, terefone, impuzu, ivyo kurya." Ibiharuro vyo kugereranya bitangwa n'inzego za reta vyerekana ko ibiciro vy'ivyankenerwa koko vyaduze  muri Ethiopia - muri rusangi mu kwezi kw'indwi vyari  ica kane hejuru y'uko vyari bimeze nk'ico gihe nyene mu mwaka uheze. Tigist akora mw'isoko-duka (supermarket) kugira ashobore gufasha umuryango. Wewe ajejwe gusuma ivyo kurya, musazawe nawe akariha inzu. Avuga kandi ko ''kuvunja idorari na vyo bitameze neza. Mu mwaka uheze, kw'idorari rimwe ($1)  waronka birr 35, ubu uronka 45." Faisal Roble, umuhinga  ari muri Amerika yihweza ibintu n'ibindi na cane cane ivyo mu karere k'ihembe rya Afrika, avuga ko gukoresha amafaranga mu bikorwa vy'intambara bigira "ingaruka mbi ku bushobozi bwa Ethiopia bwo gushikira ama dorari ''  bigatuma kandi urugero rwo kuvunja rutituka. Ntibizwi amafaranga yose intambara imaze gutwara uko angana ariko ikigo citwa Trading Economics kigereranya ko amafaranga aja mu vya gisirikare azoshika kuri miriyoni 502 z'ama dorari gushika mu mpera z'uyu mwaka, mu gihe zari miriyoni  460 mu mwaka uheze. Mu   ndwi iheze umunyamabanga mukuru wa ONU Antonio Guterres yavuze ko iyo ntanbara imaze gutwara igihugu umuriyaridi w'ama dorari. Imbere y'intambara n'ikiza ca coronavirus, ubutunzi bwa Ethiopia bwari mu bunyaruka kwiyongera cane mu karere, bwaduga muri rusangi ku rugero rwa 10% ku mwaka mu myaka 10 yo gushika mu 2019, nk'uko bigereranywa na banki y'isi (Banque Mondiale). Mu gihe Tigist avuga urugero rwo kuvunja muri banki, Roble avuga ko birr (ifaranga rya Ethiopia) kw'isoko isanzwe ho ryakorotse gusumba, ubu idorari rimwe rikaba rivunjwa birr  67. Avuga ko abagwizatunga muri ico gihugu ubu imitsi yama yaranze kubera ikibazo c'umutekano mu gihe intambara ubu yarenze imbibe za Tigray ikaba igeze mu ntara bihana imbibe za Afar na Amhara. Intambara yatanguye igihe umugambwe wahora utwara intara ya Tigray, Tigray  People's Liberation Front (TPLF) watera amakambi ya gisirikare mu kwezi kwa 11, biturutse ku kutumvikana ku bibazo vya poritike n'umushikiranganji wa mbere, Abiy Ahmed. Kuva ico gihe, ingabo za Ethiopia - hamwe n'ingabo za Eritrea zibashigikiye, bafatanije n'igipolisi n'utundi tugwi tugendana ibigwanisho, baciye batangura intambara imaze gusesa amaraso menshi, yo kugwanya TPLF. Impande zompi zimaze kwagirizwa gukora amahano, harimwo gusambanya ku nguvu no kwica  ikivunga abanyagihugu basanzwe. Intara ya Tigray nta vyankenerwa ikironka, harimwo uburyo bwo gutumatumanako hamwe na banki, kuva reta ya Ethiopia ifashe ingingo yo kwugarana iyo ntara mu kwezi kwa gatandatu, inyuma y'aho abagwanyi ba Tigray bigaruriye umugwa mukuru Mekelle. Abantu 400.000 muri Tigray ubu babayeho nk'abugarijwe n'inzara mu gihe  kubashikiriza imfashanyo bigorana cane, umuyagankuba n'ibitoro na vyo bikaba biboneka nabi nabi bigatuma ibiciro biduga. Filmon Berhane aba muri Mekelle yabwiye BBC mu rurimi rw'igi-Tigrinya ko ibiciro vy'ivyo kurya n'amazu muri iyi minsi vyaduze cane. Yavuze ati: "Nta mafaranga ahari  kuko amabanki yose arugaye, muri reta na ho ntibagitanga imishashara". Mu makungu, iyo ntambara yagize ingaruka kw'izina rya Ethiopia nk'igihugu co kujanamwo imitahe nk'uko bivugwa na Irgard Erasamus wo mu kigo ca NKC African Economics. Madame  Erasmus afatira akarorero nko ku gisata c'amaterefone co muri Ethiopia caheruka gushirwa kw'isoko y'abikorera ku giti cabo, aho cari cakweze abanyamitahe benshi barimwo abo muri Afrika y'Epfo nk'igihangange MTN. Ariko amaherezo kompanyi imwe gusa ni yo yahavuye ihiganirwa rumwe mu mpusha zibiri zari zashizwe kw'isoko, n'urufatanye rw'amakompanyi rurongowe na Safaricom yo muri Kenya ku mafaranga angana na miriyoni 850 y'amadorari. Abahinga bavuga ko intambara ya Tigray yatumye abanyamitahe bacika intege. Ukwiyongera kw'ubutunzi bwa Ethiopia muri rusangi uyu mwaka kugereranywa ko kuzogabanuka cane kuva kuri 6% mu 2020 gushika ku 2% mu 2021 - urugero rwa mbere rwo hasi mu myaka hafi 20, ku bw'ikigega mpuzamakungu FMI. Igihugu kigurira hanze ibintu biciye miriyaridi 14 z'amadorari ku mwaka, mu gihe kigurisha ibiciye  imiriyaridi 3,4 z'ama dorari. Hari n'amakenga ku kwiyongera kw'ideni rya reta ya Ethiopia mu gihugu hagati, aho hari abagereranya ko rizoshika ku miriyaridi 60 z'ama dorari uyu mwaka, hafi y'ibice 70% y'umwimbu rusangi wo muri ico gihugu. Mu gihe Amerika yafatiye ingingo zimwe zimwe zerekeye impusha zo kuja muri ico gihugu abanye Ethiopia bafise uruhara muri iyo ntambara, kandi ikanahagarika zimwe zimwe mu mfashanyo yaha Ethiopia, gushika ubu amakungu yirinze kuremera cane reta ku bijanye n'ubutunzi, canke ngo ahagarike imigambi y'imfashanyo y'ubutunzi,  hafi ica kane c'abanyagihugu babayeho musi y'urugero rw'ubukene, na yo muri rusangi umwimbu w'umunyagihugu ungana n'amadorari 850 ku mwaka.

headline: Gasape: Urubuga hwaniro rwa mbere rutangujwe n'Umurundi
text: Umurundi Saxe Perry Gateka asanzwe arongoye Radio Humuriza FM aheruka gutanguza urubuga hwaniro, rushobora kuba ari rwo rwambere rutangujwe n'umuntu ava muri ico gihugu. Urwo rubuga rukora co kimwe n'izindi zisanzwe zimenyerewe nka Facebook canke Twitter, aho abarwiyandikishako basangira amakuru yanditse, amafoto canke za video, ku buryo bwihariye bagashirako n'amajwi. Aho yavugana na BBC, Saxe Perry yavuze yuko yashatse kugira urubuga hwaniro rukora nk'izindi zihasanzwe mbere ngo rukagira ico ruzirushije. Yagize ati: "... nagerageje kwihweza izindi mbuga dusanzwe dukoresha nka za Facebook n'izindi, mugabo nkabona ko ari ibintu bikomeye cane umuntu atoshikako. WhatsApp igiye kwibandaniriza n'impinduka n'aho uwu mugambi wayo wateye induru Australia yashyizeho itegeko ryo gutuma Google na Facebook biriha amakuru Biden, ikibazo kuri Zuckerberg na Facebook "... naragize ivyigwa vya multimedia mu buhinga bwa kure ngerageje kuri internet, hanyuma ntangura gukora kugira nshobore kwihanga abantu b'abanyamahanga... nagize nti nshaka kwipima ku bihangange vya kure bikomakomeye.." Abajijwe ico urwo rubuga rwiwe rusumvya izindi, Saxe Perry yatanze akarorero avuga ko ku zindi mbuga nka Facebook canke Youtube udashobora gushirako amajwi yonyene, ariko ku rubuga rwiwe Gasape ivyo ngo birashoboka. Ku basanzwe bakoresha  Facebook na Youtube, urashobora gushirako ifoto canke video, ariko amajwi yonyene ukwayo, atari kumwe n'amashusho, ntibikunda. Ku kibazo co kumenya abaza ku rubuga Gasabe abo ari bo n'ico baba barondera, Saxe Perry yavuze   yuko ataramemya neza abaruzako abo aribo. Yagize ati: "...[runo rubuga] rushobora kuba ruriko rurakoreshwa  n'abantu bari hafi ya miriyoni zitatu. Rero sinovuga ngo ni Abarundi gusa, ariko ico nizera ni uko benshi muri bo ari Abarundi. "Ariko usivye ko harimwo n'abanyamahanga kuko turamaze kubona abantu basaba nk'ivyo twita 'ama verification y'ama page yabo', tugasanga abaturungikiye ivyangombwa vyabo ni abazungu, ni abanyamahanga. "Rero novuga yuko muri rusangi ari abantu bari kw'isi yose barukoresha... sinagomvye ko runo rubuga rwitwa urw'Abarundi gusa, ni nayo mpamvu rutiswe Gasape.bi, rwiswe Gasape.com..." Saxe Perry yamye ari umwana akerebutse. Mu mwaka wa 2005, afise imyaka 14 y'amavuko, akoresheje utwuma atoraguye hirya no hino, yarahinguye insamirizi (radio transmitter), ico gihe aca atangura kumenyekana no gushika ku rwego rwo hejuru mu gihugu. Aho niho yahereye ashinga Radio Humuriza FM ubu yumvikana mu ntara zishika icenda zo mu Burundi. Radio Humuriza FM mbere yahavuye ikorana na BBC Gahuzamiryango, icemerewe gukorera mu Burundi, aho yaza iracisha amakuru yayo kuri Humuriza FM. Mu 2017 yatowe muri wa mugambi wa Young African Leaders aja muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, akarisha ubwenge mu bitangazamakuru bitandukanye ari naho yakuye iciyumviro co gukora urubuga hwaniro. Agarutse yashinze Humuriza TV iboneka iciye ku buhinga bwa Facebook, uno mwaka naho rero akaba yatanguje urubuga hwaniro Gasape, ruboneka kuri internet co kimwe na application ija muri telephone ngendanwa. Saxe Perry avuga yuko ahanini mu bijanye n'uburyo akoresha yimenya, mu majambo yiwe akagira ati "jewe igihe cose namye ndya ikiremve ndacirasheko". Abandanya ati: "Nta muntu novuga ngo ariko aramfasha mu bijanye n'uburyo kuva ntangura runo rubuga kuko iyo mba nari mfise uburyo nari kurukora nko mu ndwi zibiri gusa." Yavuze yuko yamaze imyaka ibiri yegeranya uburyo yaba mu bijanye no kugura ama 'serveurs' canke kugura ibijanye n'umutekano kugira ntihagire abavogera urubuga rwiwe. Avuga kandi yuko mu gihe asanzwe arongoye ibitangazamakuru Humuriza FM na Humuriza TV, hari uburyo buboneka buvuye mu bamenyekanisha  ivyo bakora babicishije kuri ivyo bitangazamakuru.

headline: Mu kwahukana, Kanye West yategetswe guha Kim Kardashian ibirezo vya 200.000$ ku kwezi
text: Kanye West yategetswe guha Kim Kardashian ibihumbi 200 vy’amadorari y’Abanyamerika ku kwezi nk’ibirezo vy’abana mu masezerano yo kwahukana. Uyu muraperi rurangiranwa hamwe n’icamamare ku mboneshakure bazosangira kurera abana babo bane. Kardashian yuguruje urubanza rwo kwahukana mu 2021 inyuma y’imyaka umunani abana na West yahavuye ahindura izina akitwa Ye. Ibi bibaye inyuma y’aho amakompanyi atari make ahagarikiye gukorana na Ye kubera ukutumvikana ku bintu bitari bike harimwo amajambo y’urwanko ku Bayahudi. Mu kwa gatatu batangarijwe ko batakari kumwe , mbere na Kardashian ariyambura izina “West” mu mazina yiwe. Ivyo kugabura amatungo be no kurera abana navyo nyene vyaratorewe umuti muri sentare nk’uko biri mu mpapuro za sentare zashizwe ahabona ku wa kabiri. Impande zompi zizoza ziravugana ku ngingo zikomeye ku vyerekeye imibereho y’abana babo, nk’uko izo mpapuro zibivuga. Amafaranga azokoreshwa ku vyerekeye umutekano n’amashure vy’abana bazoyariha bompi. Vyongeye, Ye yiteze kuriha 200.000$ ku kwezi nk’ibirezo vy’abana – kubera, nk’uko ikinyamakuru New York Post kivyandika, abana bazomara igihe kinini kwa Kardashian. Bafitaniye abana bane: North w’imyaka 9, Saint 6, Chicago 4, na Psalm 3. Mu nzandiko zitari nke yasohoye imbere y’aha, Kardashian w’imyaka 42 yavuga ko yipfuza cane ko bahukana, akongerako ko ibi “bizofasha Kanye kwemera” ko uyu mubano warangiye. Imbere y’aha, Ye w’imyaka 45 yararwanije uyu mugambi wo kwahukana. Muri ano mezi ya vuba, yarateje impari, mbere n’amakompanyi atari make aramukurako icizere, harimwo Adidas, Gap, na Balenciaga. Uyu muraperi yaraneguwe bikomeye mu ntango z’uno mwaka inyuma y’aho yitabiriye indwi yahariwe umuderi, Semaine de la mode de Paris, yambaye agapira kanditseko icivugo ngo "White Lives Matter" – amajambo akoreshwa n’abazungu babona ko ari bo basumba abandi (White Supremacy). Mu nyuma yavuze ko abamunegura bahabwa amafaranga n’akarwi k’Abayahudi gakorera mu kinyegero, amajambo asanzwe akorehwa mu kurwanya abayahudi. Mu ntango z’ino ndwi, Ye yatangaje imigambi yiwe yo kwitoreza ikibanza c’umukuru w’igihugu wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu 2024. Yaheruka kwiyamamaza mu 2020, ariko yaronse amajwi 70.000 gusa.

headline: Aba-Maasai TikTok yazaniye aba-fana ba Bollywood
text: Mu mwambaro wabo uranga aba-Maasai kandi bakikijwe n'inka, abanya-Tanzania ba vuba mu kuba rurangiranwa kuri Tik Tok, abavukana Kili na Neema Paul, bariko bitegurira gufata video yabo ya vuba. Terefone ngendanwa igezweho yashinzwe ku nkingi imetero nkeya imbere y'inzu yabo muri Mindu Tulieni, ikigwati gito co mu ntara ya Pwani yo mu buseruko, Igisagara kiri hafi, Lugoba, kiri ku rugendo rw'isaha n'amaguru. Mu gihe ico kigwati ata muyagankuba gifise, Kili akigendera buri munsi kugira ashire umuriro muri terefone yiwe. Mu kwitegurira gufata iyo video , Kili, w'imyaka 26, ahagaze inyuma ya mushikiwe w'imyaka 23, Neema. Umuziki umaze gutangura kuvuga, Kili na mushikiwe baca bakurakuranwa mu kwigana  mu gi-Hindi bongera batamba  ku murindi w'izo ndirimbo zizwi cane muri  film/sinema za Bollywood [ingene bakubita iminwa bigahurirana neza neza n'amajambo y'iyo ndirimbo nk'uko womenga ijwi ni iryabo kandi humvikana iry'uwayiririmvye bwite; Lip sync). Mu mezi make aheze, izo video zabo zo gukubita iminwa zararabwe cane ku mbuga hwaniro mu Buhindi. Video yabo yamenyekanye cane, bigana  Raataan Lambiyan yo muri Shershaah , film y'uyu mwaka ya Bollywood, yarabwe incuro zirenga miriyoni imwe mu minsi mike gusa. Yakwiragijwe n'abakinyi bakuru muri iyo film Kiara Advani na Sidharth  Malhotra. Nyene kuririmba ubwa mbere iyo ndirimbo,  Jubin Nautiyal, yaratunguye abo bavukanyi igihe bagira ikiganiro c'ikibiriraho kuri imwe mu maradiyo yo mu Buhindi. Nautiyal yababwiye ati : "Bose barabazi  mu Buhindi. Muri rurangiranwa". Video bakoreye muri Mindu Tulieni, aho benshi badatunze terefone zigezweho, Kili na Neema ntibigeze bibaza ko zoshikiriye abantu baharurwa muri za miriyoni mu Buhindi no kw'isi nzima. Kili ati: "Tugitangura, vyari ibintu vyo kwiryohera gusa, ntitwigeze twibaza ko tuzomenyekana isi yose. "Maze gutangura kubona abantu bariko barayiraba n'ico bavuga mu Buhindi, naratangaye. Nararengewe." Icabatumye gukora izo video n'ugukunda film za Bollywood Kili yatanguye kuraba igihe yagenda mu mashure ku murwa mukuru , Dodoma. N'ubwo batari bazi urwo rurimi, we na mushikiwe bariyigishije kuririmba mu gi-Hindi. Kili avuga ati: "Kuva nkiri muto, nararaba ama film ya Bollywood mu ma cinema yo muri Tanzania nca ndakunda cane izo film n'indirimbo zirimwo. Iyo ukunda ikintu, biroroshe kuciga". "Binsaba iminsi mike yo kwiga amajambo y'indirimbo no kwimenyereza kuyisubiramwo. Ndarondera ico ayo majambo asigura mu congereza kugira menye uko ndayitamba neza." "N'imbere y'uko numva ico indirimbo ivuga, mba namaze kujana n'umuziki wayo." Kili yatanguye asubiramwo izo ndirimbo wenyene, mu nyuma azana mushikiwe nawe nyene asanzwe akunda film za  Bollywood. Neema avuga ati: "Igihe musazanje yansaba kugira video hamwe nawe, nabanje kwanka kuko nari mfise isoni zo kuja imbere ya camera." "Ariko mu nyuma ntangura kubimenyera. Ivy'abaye ni amayobera - ntitwigeze twibaza ko umunsi nk'uwo woshitse." Abo bavukana babiri, ubwa mbere bakuze baragira inka bakora no mu mirima, ubu umwanya bawumara batanga ibiganiro kuri television na radiyo zikomakomeye zo mu Buhindi. Ariko no mu gihugu cabo ca Tanzania, ubu baratanguye kumenyekana nka bamwe mu bazwi cane kuri Tik Tok. Konte izwi ya Kili kuri Tik Tok  ubu ifise miriyoni 1,8 y'abantu bamukurikira . Nta mwaka urakwira kuva atanguje iyo konte yiwe - amaze kumenya ivyerekeye Tik Tok abibwiwe n'abagenzi. Neema nawe aramaze kwuguruza konte yiwe kuri Instagram, ubu ikaba ifise abayikurikira bashika hafi 65.000. Ariko  mu gihe inkuru y'abo bavukana iriko irabica bigacika ku mbuga hwaniro hirya no hino kw'isi, mu muryango no mu babanyi ho basa n'uko ataco bazi kuba abana babo bariko baraba ba rurangiranwa. Kili avuga ati: "Abantu benshi ngaha ntibatunze terefone zigezweho kandi ntibazi ivyerekeye imbuga hwaniro. Na Neema nta vyinshi atahura. Biramuryohera gusa ariko ntazi ingaruka biriko biragira". "Nta muntu n'umwe yumva ivyari vyo igihe abanyamakuru batangura kuza mu kigwati iwacu bazanye n'ama-camera ya television. "Ubwa mbere umuryango wanje waguma wibaza igituma ndirimba  kandi ngatamba aho kuragira inka. "Ubu baratanguye gutahura ko ndiko ndakora ikintu ciza." Nta mafaranga barakura muri ivyo biyumviriye gukora, ariko vuba barashobora kuva mu buzima bwo mu kigwati bakaja gukina film/sinema. Ibinyamakuru vyo mu Buhindi bivuga ko baja bamaze gutangura kuronderwa cane  na Bollywood. Ni indoto zabaye ukuri kuri Kili  na Neema, bavuga ko kuva kera bamye bashaka gukora ivyo guteramisha abantu, ariko batigeze bibaza ko vyoshobotse. "Tuva mu kigwati gito hanze y'igisagara, nico gituma ntigeze nibaza ko indoto zanje zo kuba umukinyi w'ama-film no guhagarara imbere ya camera zobaye ukuri. Ivyo nabigumanye mu mutima wanje", ivyo bivugwa na Neema, we bitandukanye na musazawe,  atigeze ava muri Mundu Tulieni. "Amahirwe yo kuja mu Buhindi yoba ari igitangaza." Amakungu arorera, abo bavukana bavuga ko bafise ishaka ryo gutangura gukora izindi video zo guha ababakurikira. "Dushaka ko abantu baraba izi video bakaryoherwa, nico gituma twatanguye kuzikora." "Vyinshi biri mu nzira, abafana bacu rero ni bagume hafi." Priya Sippy n'umunyamakuru akorera uwubimusavye aba  London.

headline: Christine Ntahe: Menya uyu murundikazi yahawe agashimwe ka Kenn Allen Global Award
text: Umupfasoni Christine Ntahe w'umurundikazi yahawe agashimwe mpuzamakungu ku bikorwa vyiwe vyo kwitangira uburenganzira bwa kiremwamuntu cane cane mu kwitaho abana bo mw'ibarabara. Ni agashimwe ahawe nk'umukorerabushake n'ishirahamwe International Association for Volunteer Effort kitiriwe Kenn Allen Global Award kaje kwiyongera ku bundi butari buke amaze kuronka kubera ibi bikorwa vyiwe amazemwo imyaka irenga 25. Christine Ntahe, Maman Dimanche nk'uko azwi cane i Bujumbura no mu gihugu, yabwiye BBC ko yatanguye gufasha abana bo mw'ibarabara mu 1994, igihe igihugu cari mu ndyane z'amoko zatanguye inyuma y'igandagurwa rya Perezida Melchior Ndadaye mu 1993. Ati: "Naciye ngerageza kuba hafi y'abana bo mw'ibarabara, mvuga nti nta mwana ategerezwa kuba mw'ibarabara, ibarabara ntirirera. Ntangura kubaba hafi igihe amasasu yari menshi mu gisagara ca Bujumbura no mu gihugu cose, jewe nkaba nahambije abana bo mw'ibarabara bo mu gisagara". Mu mwaka wa 2000, umupfasoni Ntahe yashinze ishirahamwe Bon Geste ryo gufasha abana ba ntahonikora uhereye ku bana bo mw'ibarabara, impfuvyi n'abandi ba ntahonikora mu Burundi, igihugu cagiye gica mu ndyane zatumye biyongera. Umupfasoni Ntahe avuga ko yatanguriye ku bana cumi bo mw'ibarabara, ubu akaba amaze kuramura abatari bake, mbere bamwe muri bo bahejeje amakaminuza, abandi bakaba baciga. Avuga ko bitamworoheye kubera ibibazo vy'amoko vyari bihanze igihugu ico gihe kuko wewe yakira uwo ari we wese ataravye amamuko yiwe. Ati: "Ndibuka ca gihe Uburundi bwari mu bihano, nahora ngenda kubatora n'amaguru hariya kuri Place de l'Indépendance [ikibanza citiriwe ukwikukira], tukaza n'amaguru, hari henshi twaca bakadutera amabuye, ntitwari tuzi abo ari bo". Ntahe avuga ko impande zompi zamurwanya kuko ata ruhande na rumwe rwemera ivyo akora. Ati: "Irya ntambara yari iy'ubwoko hagati y'Abahutu n'Abatutsi. Hariho Abahutu bamwe bamwe bambwira bati ntitukwemera kuko ntamututsikazi n'umwe ashobora gukorera iciza umuhutu ataco ariko ararondera. "Abatutsi nabo bamwe bamwe bakambwira bati 'umviriza, ivyo ukora vyose wiruka inyuma y'abo bana b'Abahutu, nibo bazoza kugukata umutwe'. "Jewe rero nta hantu na hamwe nari mpagaze, uretse guhagararira ukuri, urukundo n'ugukorera Imana kuko nabona ko abana bariko bazira ubusa". Ni ivyo bikorwa vyiwe vyo kwitangira abana vyamuhaye iritazirano rya "Maman Dimanche" rizwi cane i Bujumbura, avuga ko yahawe n'abo bana nyene asanzwe afasha. Avuga ko muri kino gihe afise abana bashika amajana abiri yama afungurira imisi yose muhira iwe. Kuva atanguye iki gikorwa, amaze kuramura amajana n'amajana, bamwe biga muri za kaminuza, zaba izo mu gihugu canke hanze, abandi nabo bakaba bakibandanya amashure mato n'ayisumbuye. "Ico babigiriye ntaco nzi, gusa barashimye, kandi iyo bashimye uvyakira uko. Jewe rero ni agashimwe kiyongera ku bundi, kuko n'umukuru w'igihugu yarampaye agashimwe mu 2012", niko Ntahe avuga. Ku bw'iwe, ivyo akora abikora nk'umuvyeyi arera abana biwe neza, hanyuma bakaramurwa. Ati: "Ubundi nta muntu yategerezwa gushimirwa ariko arakora ico yategerezwa gukora, kuko nico Imana ituremera kw'isi, kugira umuntu afashe aho ari mu vyo ashobora. "Mu mutima jewe nta kintu kinini nabona nkora co gushimirwa kuko mbona umengo hari vyinshi ntarakora. "Ariko gusa ibi vyerekana ko ivyo nkora bishimwa n'ababibona, mu kuvyerekana bakabicisha muri utu dushimwe n'imfashanyo nkenke baza barafashisha". Christine Ntahe avuga ko ata wundi mugambi afise uretse kubandanya afasha aba bana bo mw'ibarabara kuko babandanya biyongera. Ati: "Jewe umugambi ni uwo kubandanya ndabakurikirana, nongera ndabafasha kugira ngo bashike ku ndoto zabo. Ati: "Usanga abenshi ubabajije bavuga ko bashaka kwiga kugira ngo bazotere imbere. Bafise indoto, nanje indoto zanje ni ugushikana abo bana ku ndoto zabo". Uretse abo yafashije i Bujumbura, ubu baharurwa mu majana ane, hari abandi bo muri komine Mutambu y'intara ya Bujumbura bashika ku 600 yafashije kubera iyo komine yabaye ikiririmbiro ry'intambara. Christine Ntahe avuga ko ibibazo agira muri iki gikorwa ari vyinshi cane, cane cane bishingiye ku buryo, mu gihe "abana bo mw'ibarabara bakenera vyinshi kandi babandanya biyongera". Ati: "Abo bana baguma biyongera, ivyo kubafungurira ntibikwira, abana ugasanga barwara nkabura uburyo bwo kubavuza, ibi vyose ni ingorane zikomeye mu gihe ari jewe jenyene nibako". Christine Ntahe arashima ingene reta yitayeho ikibazo c'abana bo mw'ibarabara, ariko akavuga ko hari ingorane nyinshi. Hamaze kugeragezwa kenshi kuvana abo bana mw'ibarabara na cane cane mu gisagara ca Bujumbura, umwe wese akajanwa iyo akomoka kugira yitabweho n'abo aho avuka canke ubutegetsi bw'aho. Madame Ntahe yemeza ko hari ibintu bitagenze neza kuko "abenshi muri bo baca bagaruka". Ati: "Ntibaba bateguwe bikwiye, na cane cane abavyeyi babo, kuko abana bamaze umwanya munini mw'ibarabara, biragoye kubumvisha ko bosubira mu miryango yabo". Christine Ntahe avuga ko ingorane nyamukuru ari uko hari abavyeyi barungika abana babo mw'ibarabara. Ati: "Hari umwana akubarira ati 'jewe ntaronse ibihumbi bitatu ku musi sintaha, mama ntankundira'. Ibaze rero abavyeyi baguma muhira bakarindira ko abana babo baja mw'ibarabara kubaronderera ibibabeshaho". Mu gihe hari abagiriza reta n'amashirahamwe yitaho agateka k'abana ko ikibazo cabananiye, umupfasoni Ntahe wewe yagiriza abavyeyi ko ari bo ntambamyi nyamukuru mu twigoro two kubakura mw'ibarabara. Ati: "Ni ukuri reta n'amashirahamwe bakora uko bashoboye ariko rero abavyeyi nabo ni intambamyi". Umupfasoni Ntahe arashima ibikorwa n'abajejwe agateka k'abana ariko agasaba reta gukora uko ishoboye igahimiriza abavyeyi bagakurikirana abana babo. Ati: "Abatishoboye rwose reta ikabafasha, ibahimirize kugira baje mu mashirahamwe kugira ngo bashobore gufasha abana babo". Atera akamo amashirahamwe afasha abana gushira hamwe inguvu kugira ngo bashobore gufasha aba bana. Asaba reta ko yohimiriza abatware ku nzego zo hasi gukurikirana abana babo, bakamenya iyo buri mwana ari.

headline: Australia: 'Abanyamahanga batubahiriza amategeko ya Covid bazirukanwa'
text: Umushikiranganji ajejwe abimukira muri Australia yavuze ko abanyamahanga bazofatwa bariko bararenga ku mategeko ajanye n'amagara y'abantu bashobora gusubizwa iwabo. Alex Hawke yavuze ko yababajwe cane n'ivyo yabonye kuri 'beach' ya Bronte i Sydney ku musi wa Noheli. Video y'abantu benshi yashizwe ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi yerekana urwaruka ruririmba rwongera rutamba, rurenze ku mategeko yo kugwanya coronavirus. Bamwe mu babiboneye bavuze ko benshi bari abongereza. Ingabo zidasanzwe za Australia zagirizwa kwica abasivire muri Afghanistani Uko inyoni ya gasuku yarokoye nyirayo wari ugiye guhira mu nzu Virusi ya Covid imara 'iminsi 28 itarapfa' muri 'laboratoire' Australia iri mu rugamba rwo kugwanya ico kiza giherutse kwongerekana inyuma y'amezi atari make ata muntu abonetse yanduriye mu gihugu hagati. Iyaduka bushasha bw'uwo mugera indwi imwe imbere ya Noheli ryatumye hasubira gushirwaho ayandi mategeko yo kwikingira muri ico gisagara, harimwo kubuza amakoraniro menshi mu biruhuko no kwiyugarana mu karere kamerewe nabi ka Northern Beaches. Ubu abamaze gufatwa muri iryo yongerekana ry'ico kiza bashika 129. Hawke yabwiye radio Sydney ati:"Mu gihe umuntu ageramiye umutekano w'abantu c'anke amagara, viza yiwe ishobora gufutwa ." Yavuze ko yasavye ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati mu gihugu gukorana n'abategetsi ba New South Wales (NSW) muri iyi misi himirije umwaka mushasha kugira ngo umuntu wese azofatwa "akora ibintu bidakurikije amategeko", viza yiwe izoce isubira kwihwezwa na reta. Yavuze ko benshi mu bafise viza z'akanya gato bubahiriza amategeko y'amagara y'abantu. Igipolisi kivuga ko ata n'umwe mu bari mu musi mukuru i Bronte yaciwe amande canke ngo ahanwe. Australia yarugaye imbibe ku bantu nka bose kiretse ku benegihugu batashe canke abafise uruhusha rwo kuba muri ico gihugu n'imiryango yabo mu kwezi kwa gatatu. Mu kwezi kwa kane, reta yavuze ko hariyo abantu barenga imiliyoni zibiri bafise viza y'umwanya muto muri ico gihe.

headline: Amahasa yavutse mu nsoro zabitswe mu bukonje imyaka 30
text: N﻿a  Sam Cabral BBC News Amahasa yavutse mu ntara ya Tennessee yo muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika avuye mu nsoro (urusoro: umwana akiri mu nda) zabitswe mu bukonje mu kiringo c’imyaka irenga 30 iheze. Bifatwa ko ari insoro za mbere zimaze igihe kirekire zikavamwo ikiremwamuntu. Zabitswe mu bukonje bungana na -128C (ni ukuvuga ubushuhe bungana na 128C musi y’ubusa) mu mazi ya nitrogen (azote) ku wa 22 Ndamukiza (4) 1992. Rachel Ridgeway, nyina w’abana bane ava i Oregon, yibarutse aya mahasa ku wa 31 Gitugutu (10) uno mwaka. Se wabo, Philip Ridgeway, avuga ko ari ibisigabwenge. Lydia Ann na Timothy Ronald Ridgeway basa n’uko ari bo baciye umuhigo, nk’uko bivugwa n’ikigo National Embryo Donation Center (NEDC), ikigo cegamiye idini kivuga ko kimaze gufasha kuvyara impinja zirenga 1.200 zivuye mu nsoro zatanzwe n’abandi. Uwari amaze guca umuhigo afashijwe n’iki kigo NEDC, Molly Gibson, yavutse mu 2020 mu nsoro zabitswe mu bukonje mu kiringo c’imyaka hafi 27. Muganga John David Gordon yabitse izi nsoro avuga ati: "Iyi ngingo…yo kubika izi nsoro yohumuriza abibaza nimba hariho umuntu uwo ari we wese yoba yipfuza kwakira insoro bakoze inyuma y’imyaka 5, 10, 20 iheze”. "Inyishu ikomeye cane ni ego!" Izi nsoro z’amahasa zavuye mu mbuto zatanzwe n’umugabo n’umugore batazwi bari bubakanye, bakaba bategerezwa kuvyara hakoreshejwe ubuhinga bwa IVF (Fécondation in vitro/In vitro fertilization), ubuhinga bwo kuvyara bukorerwa hanze y’igitereko c’umugore. Umugabo yari mu myaka 50 akaba avugwa ko yahawe irigi n’umugore w’imyaka 34. Izi nsoro zabitswe mu bubiko bwa laboratoire ijejwe irondoka muri Amerika gushika mu 2007, igihe uyu muryango waziha ikigo NEDC muri Knoxville, Tennessee kugira ngo uwundi muryango uzikoreshe. Umuhinga mu bijanye n’insoro kw’ivuriro Southeastern Fertility ry’abubakanye ry’ikigo NEDC yaciye ayeyusha izi nsoro hanyuma azishira mu gitereko muri uno mwaka. Mw’itangazo, NEDC ivuga ko yizeye ko iyi nkuru ishobora “gutera intege abandi kugira ngo baronke aya mahirwe yo kwakira izi nsoro kugira ngo bashobore kuvyara”. Ni we mwana wa mbere umuryango wa Ridgeway - usanzwe ufise abandi bana bane bari hagati y’umwaka umwe n’imyaka umunani – baronse hakoreshejwe ubuhinga bwa IVF canke ku mbuto zitanzwe n’abagiraneza. Ari muhira mu muryango, Philip Ridgeway yabwiye imboneshakure CNN ati: "Nari mfise imyaka itanu igihe Imana iha ubuzima Lydia na Timothy, kandi yabandanije kuzigama ubwo buzima kuva ico gihe”. "Aha rero twovuga ko ari bo bana bacu bakuru, n’aho ari bo bana bacu bato”. Yongerako ati: "Muri ibi bintu harimwo igisigabwenge”.

headline: Coronavirus: Umukuru w'igihugu ca Ghana yifatiye ingingo ya Guma mu rugo
text: Umukuru w'igihugu ca Ghana, Nana Akufo-Addo, yifatiye ingingo ya guma mu rugo mu kiringo c'iminsi 14 ku mpanuro yahawe n'abaganga, inyuma y'aho umwe mu bamwegereye yapimwe agasanga yaranduye wa mugera coronavirus. Iyo ngingo yamenyeshejwe mw'itangazo ryaraye risohowe na leta y'igo gihugu ejo ku wa gatandatu, rivuga riti: "Uno munsi nta mugera bamutoye, ariko yahisemwo iyi ngingo mu kwinengesera". Iryo tangazo rivuga ariko ko Perezida Akufo-Addo azobandanya akora akazi muri ico kiringo cose, ariko akurikiza ingingo zose zijanye no kwikingira Covid-19. Hagati aho, iryo tangazo ntirimenyesha nimba  uyo muntu amwegereye ari umukozi canke ari uyo mu muryango wiwe. Gushika ubu, igihugu ca Ghana giharurwamwo abanduye coronavirus 19.388, kikaba ari kimwe mu bihugu vyo munsi y'ubugaragwa bwa Afrika bifise ibitigiri binini vy'abanduye. Muri abo, 117 barahitanywe n'iyo ndwara, nayo 14.330 nabo bakaba bayikize. Icegera c'umushikiranganji w'ubudandaji n'amahinguriro muri ico gihugu co mu burengero bwa Afrika, Carlos Kingsley Ahenkorah, yaratanze imihoho hirya y'ejo ku wa gatanu kubera yarenze ku mategeko ya guma mu rugo inyuma y'aho apimiwe agasanga yaranduye.

headline: Uyu muringa ukingira abagore umugera wa SIDA?
text: Hari akaringa gashasha gaherutse kwemerwa n'ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS/WHO, ko kokoreshwa mu gukingira abagore umugera wa SIDA. Ni akaringa gakozwe muri silicone  kinjizwa mu gitsina c'umugore maze kakarekura umuti witwa dapivirine urwanya umugera. N'aho hari intambwe zimaze gushikwako mu kuvura no gukinga, umugera wa SIDA uracasasika inganda mu bihugu bitari bike cane cane ku mugabane wa Afrika. Ibice bibiri vya bitatu vy'abantu bose banduye umugera wa SIDA kw'isi bari ku mugabane wa Afrika, bafise imyaka hagati ya 15 na 24, nk'uko bivugwa n'ishirahamwe ONU. Mu buseruko n'ubumanuko bwa Afrika, abantu barenga imiriyoni 20 bagendana uwu mugera. Abagore bakiri bato nibo ahanini babangamirwa: ku ncuro zibiri ugereranije n'abagabo, abagore nibo bafise igihamana kibi co kwandura umugera wa SIDA. OMS iherutse gutanga uburenganzira bwo gukoresha uwu muringa kugira ngo abagore bashobore kwikingira mu gihe bakora imibonano mpuzabitsina. Mu kiganiro Africa Daily ca BBC, Doreen Morah Moracha w'imyaka 28 aba i Nairobi muri Kenya, asanzwe agendana umugera wa SIDA avuga ko kwikingira ari co kintu ca mbere kiza imbere mu kurwanya uwu mugera. Moracha amaze imyaka 16 yose afata imiti yo gupfupfahaza. Kubw'iwe, gufata iyi miti ubuzima bwose si ikintu coroshe. Ati: "Nipfuza ko abandi bose bokwikingira uwu mugera wa SIDA, kubera burya hari abibaza ko ari ibintu vyoroshe, ariko gufata imiti ubuzima bwawe bwose si ikintu coroshe na gato". Bumwe mu buryo bukoreshwa cane mu kwikingira umugera wa SIDA, harimwo udukingirizo, harimwo mbere n'agakingirizo k'abagore. Umupfasoni Moracha avuga ko abagore batoroherwa kugakoresha kubera akenshi usanga atari bo bifatira ingingo. Avuga ko abagabo bobo boroherwa gukoresha agakingirizo kabo kubera akenshi umugabo ari we afata ingingo. Ati: "Iyo umugore asavye ko bokwikingira, umugabo atabishatse aca akamomora akagata, rero muri ico gihe umugore nta bubasha aba afise bwo gufata ingingo". Hari kandi ibinini bifatwa imbere canke inyuma y'imibonano mpuzabitsina (PREP) ku muntu atarandura uwu mugera, ariko ibi navyo ntivyoroshe kuronka. Uwo muringa uje kuba nk'inyishu kuri izo ngorane. Ni umuringa wambarwa mu kiringo c'imisi 28, hanyuma muri ico kiringo cose ugasohora umuti uzwi nka dapivirine utuma umuntu atandura umugera wa SIDA. Anna Kukundakwe ajejwe imigambi mu kigo kijejwe amagara y'abantu, uburenganzira bwa muntu n'iterambere muri Uganda avuga ko ikintu nyamukuru ari uko umugore we nyene ubwiwe ashobora kwishirira uru muringa mu gitsina, atarinze gufashwa n'umuganga. Ati: "Kenshi iyo umugore yipfuza gukora imibonano mpuzabitsinda yikingiye, ntibimworohera gusaba ko uwo bashaka kuyikorana yambara agakingirizo. Ariko uwu muringa uramuha ububasha bwo kwikingira igihe abishatse mw'ibanga, kandi ntategerezwa kubwira umugabo ko awambaye". Mu bikorwa vyo kugerageza uwu muringa, vyabonetse ko igihamana kibi co kwandura uwu mugera cagabanutse gushika ku bice vyababa 30% gusa, ariko Rachel Bagley arongoye igisata co gupima imiti mw'ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS, avuga ko bishobora kuja hasi gusumba. Uwu muringa wambarwa n'uyo mugore yiyizi ko atarandura umugera kandi yiyizi ko akunze gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina, umupfasoni Anna akavuga ko abadakunze gukora iyo mibonano batokwirukira uwo muringa. Ati: "Rero abagore boronswa inyigisho zikwiye mu buryo bwose bushoboka kugira ngo bashobore kwihitiramwo bo nyene uburyo bokoresha, nimba bipfuza gukoresha agakingirizo, ibinini canke uwu muringa". Igiciro c'uwo muringa ntikiramenyekana neza, ariko umupfasoni Bagley avuga ko utegerezwa kuzoba utazimvye, uri ku giciro kimwe n'ubundi bukingirizo. Yipfuza ko uwu muringa woba ku giciro giciriritse cane cane mu bihugu bikenye birangwamwo umugera ku rugero runini, mbere ugatangwa ku buntu.

headline: Ibibazo vyanyu kuri Covid-19: Kuki basinyisha umuntu imbere y'urukingo?
text: Tubandanya kubashikiriza inyishu ku bibazo muturungikira ku kiza ca coronavirus Ikibazo duherako uno munsi ni ica Manariyo Osias, yabajije agira ati "mbe ni kubera iki umuntu imbere yo kumuha urukingo babanza kumuteza umukono ku rwandiko ruvuga yuko ataco azobaza nihaba ingaruka, kandi we izo ngaruka aba atazo azi?" Muganga Nduwayo Leonard akorera mu Bufaransa niwe atanga inyishu, akaba avugana na Robert Patrick Misigaro. (Umviriza aho hejuru)

headline: Saadi Gaddafi: Umuhungu w'uwahoze atwara Libya yavuye mu munyororo i Tripoli
text: Umuhungu w'uwahora atwara Libya Muammar Gaddafi yarekuwe ava mw'ibohero yari arimwo kuva mu 2014. Saadi Gaddafi - yahora ari umukuru w'ingabo zidasanzwe za Libya - yari azwi cane kuba yagerageje umwuga wo gukina umupira w'amaguru mu Butaliyano. Mu 2003 yari  yasinye gukinira Perugia, ariko yabonetse gake cane mu kibuga. Yahungiye muri Niger igihe se yatembagazwa ku butegetsi hanyuma akicwa mu 2011, ariko mu nyuma arafatwa asubizwa muri Libya aho yejejwe ku vyaha birimwo kwica. Isoko ryo mu bushikiranganji bw'ubutungane ryabwiye itotororokanirizo ry'amakuru AFP ko ingingo  yo kurekura uwo muhungu wa Gaddafi yafashwe hakurikijwe urubanza sentare yaciye haraheze imyaka myinshi. Bivugwa ko Saadi Gaddafi afise imyaka 47 canke 48. Irindi soko rivuga ko hari ivyategerezwa kwuzuzwa kugira ngo kurekurwa bishoboke. Yagirijwe kuba yishe umumenyereza w'umupira w'amaguru w'umunya-Libya  Bashir al-Rayani mu 2005, hamwe n'ivyaha ku bantu bari mu myiyerekano igihe  ukwiyamiriza ubutegetsi bwa se kwatangura mu 2011. Ariko mu nyuma basanze ata caha kimwagira. Imbere y'uko aja muri Perugia,  yarakiniye imigwi itandukanye muri Libya, akanakinira umugwi w'igihugu. Ubu bivugwa ko yafashe indege aja muri Turkiya. Mw'itangazo, reta ya Libya y'ubumwe bw'igihugu yavuze ko yizigiye ko irekurwa ryiwe rizofasha gukomeza ugusubiza hamwe mu gihugu. Kuva mu 2011, igihugu kirangwa n'intanbara hamwe n'akajagari.

headline: DR Congo: Umusirikare wa MONUSCO yishwe ku kirindiro cayo i Minembwe
text: Ingabo zarungitswe kugarukana amahoro muri Repubulika y’Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo, MONUSCO, ziriyamiriza igitero cakozwe ku kirindiro cazo mu karere ka Minembwe mu ntara ya Kivu y’Epfo. MONUSCO ivuga ko iki gitero cakozwe n’umurwi w’inyeshamba Twirwaneho ku wa 30 z’ukwezi kw’icenda, isaha zine n’igice z’ijoro. Nk’uko MONUSCO ibivuga, umusirikare umwe wayo yarishwe n’abantu bitwaje inkoho bariko begera iki kirindiro cayo inyuma y’aho bavuganiye nayo ko bashaka kwishikana. Mw’itangazo yaraye isohoye, MONUSCO yibutsa ko ibikorwa vyayo vyo kwaka ibirwanisho abarwanyi bihagarariwe n’Inama nkuru y’ishirahamwe ONU kandi ko bikorwa ata nkunzi. Ivuga ko gutera ingabo zarungitswe kugarukana amahoro bishobora gufatwa nk’icaha co mu ntambara. MONUSCO isaba reta gukora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo abakoze iki gitero bashengezwe. Ingabo zarungitswe kugarukana amahoro muri Congo zimaze imyaka irenga 20 ariko ntizirashobora kugarukana ituze mu buseruko bw’ico gihugu burangwamwo imirwi y’inyeshamba irenga 100. Abanyagihugu bo muri ako karere bakaba babona ko ataco ibamariye. Mu kw’indwi, haradutse imishamirano hagati ya MONUSCO n’abanyagihugu, aho abari muri yo baturiye bongera barasahura ibigo vyayo mu gisagara ca goma. Abashika 19 nibo bazwi ko baguye muri ino mishamirano.

headline: Iran 'iriko irasenyura' igipolisi kijejwe inyifato kubera imyiyerekano
text: N﻿a Siavash Ardalan & Marita Moloney BBC Persian Umushikirizamanza mukuru w’igihugu avuga ko igipolisi kijejwe inyifato, ari naco kijejwe kwubahiriza itegeko rya Islam rijejwe inyambaro muri Irani, kiriko kirasenyurwa. Amajambo ya Mohammad Jafar Montazeri, n’aho ataremezwa n’ibindi bisata, yashikirijwe mu birori vyariko biba ejo ku wa Mungu. Irani imaze amezi atari make mu myiyerekano yaturutse ku rupfu rw’umugore yari akiri muto yapfiriye mu gasho. Mahsa Amini yari yapfunzwe n’igipolisi kijejwe inyifato camwagiriza ko yahonyanze amabwirizwa ajanye no kwitwikira. Montazeri yari mw’ikoraniro ry’amadini igihe abazwa niba igipolisi kijejwe inyifato kiriko kirasamburwa. Yavuze ati: "Igipolisi kijejwe inyifato ntaco gisa gisana n’ubutungane kandi carugawe kuva aho catanguriye”. Iki gipolisi kigenzurwa n’ubushikiranganji bw’intwaro yo hagati, ntikigenzurwa n’ubutungane. Ku wa gatandatu, Montazeri yabwiye kandi inama nshingamateka ya Irani ko ibwirizwa ritegeka abagore kwambara wa mwambaro wa hijab rigiye kwihwezwa. Ariko n’aho igipolisi kijejwe inyifato kiriko kirasamburwa ntibisigura ko iri tegeko rimaze imyaka mirongo rizoca rihinduka. Imyiyerekano irongowe n’abagore, yiswe “imigumuko” n’abategetsi, ikwiragiye muri Irani kuva Amini  yari afise imyaka 22 apfiriye mu gasho ku wa 16 z’ukw’icenda, inyuma y’imisi itatu ahagaritswe n’igipolisi kijejwe inyifato ku mugwa mukuru Tehran. Urupfu rwiwe rwabaye intandaro y’aka kaguma ariko kandi rwaje rukurikira uburakari bwari busanzwe mu gihugu butewe n’ubukene, ubushomeri, ubusumbasumbane, akarenganyo n’igiturire. Mu gihe vyokwemezwa, isamburwa ry’igipolisi kijejwe inyifato ryoba ryerekana ko ubutegetsi bwemeye impinduka ariko nta cemeza ko ico conyene coba kimaze kugira ngo imyiyerekano ihagarare, aho abari muri yo bagiye baturira ibitambara vyo kwitwikira mu mutwe. Mu kiganiro Newshour ca BBC, umugore umwe w’umunya-Irani yavuze ati: "Kubona reta yafashe ingingo yo gusenyura igipolisi kijejwe inyifato ntibisigura ko imyiyerekano ihagaze. "N’aho reta yovuga ko kwambara hijab ari ku gushaka kw’umuntu ntibihagije. Abanyagihugu barazi ko ata kazoza ka Irani igifise reta nk’iyi ku butegetsi. “Tugiye kubona ingene abanyagihugu b’ingeri zitandukanye za Irani, baba ba ntahompagaze canke abakigendera ku mico ya kera, baza gushigikira abagore bariko bararwanira uburenganzira bwabo”. Uwundi mugore nawe ati: "Twebwe, abari mu myiyerekano, ntitukirajwe ishinga na hijab. Tumaze imisi 70 dutembera tutayambaye. "Tubona impinduka. Hijab niyo yabaye intango kandi nta kindi dushaka kindi atari urupfu rw’umukuru w’igihugu atwaza umukazo n’ihinduka ry’ubutegetsi”. Ibinyamakuru vya reta ya Irani vyahakanye amakuru avuga ko igipolisi kijejwe inyifato kiriko kirasaburwa, nk’uko bivugwa na CNN. Imboneshakure ya reta Al-Alam yoba yatangaje ko ibinyamakuru vyo mu mahanga vyerekana ko amajambo ya Montazeri avuga ko "Irani yasubije umugongo inyuma ku kibazo ca hijab n’ukwicisha bugufi, kandi ko vyavuye ku migumuko iheruka”. "Ariko nta mutegetsi n’umwe wa Irani aratangaza ko igipolisi kijejwe inyifato casambuwe”. Umushikiranganji wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ajejwe imigenderanire Antony Blinken avuga ko ari nka hamwe Irani yosambura igipolisi kijejwe inyifato coba ari “ikintu ciza” anashimagiza “ubutwari budasanzwe bw’urwaruka rwa Irani, cane cane abagore, bafashe iya mbere muri ino myiyerekano”. Blinken avuga ati: "Nimba ubutegetsi hari ukuntu bwishuye ibisabwa muri iyo myiyerekano, iki coba ari ikintu ciza”. Kuva habaye impinduka za ki-Islam mu 1979 muri Irani, iki gihugu cagiye kigira integuro zitandukanye z’“igipolisi kijejwe inyifato”, ariko ikiriho ubu – kizwi nka Gasht-e Ershad – nico nyamukuru muri kino gihe kijejwe guhagararira ikurikizwa ry’itegeko rya Islam rijejwe inyifato muri Irani. Catanguye gukizura mu 2006 mu ntumbero yo kwubahiriza ibwirizwa rigenga inyambaro, ritegeka abagore kwambara impuzu ndende rikabuza kwambara ikaburuta, amajinisi (jeans) atabaguye hamwe n’izindi mpuzu zifatwa ko zitiyubashe.

headline: Abo umurongo ukaze mu bibanza bikomeye muri reta y'aba Taliban
text: Aba Taliban batangaje abagize reta mfatakibanza muri Afghanistan, baca banamenyesha ko ico gihugu kigiye kugengwa n'amategeko ya Islam. Iyo reta, igizwe n'abagabo gusa, irimwo abakuru bakuru mu ndongozi z'aba-Taliban bamwe bazwi cane mu bitero ku ngabo z'abanyamerika mu myaka 20 iheze. Reta izoba irongowe na Mullah Mohammad Hassan Akhund, umwe mu bashinze uwo muhari, nawe asanzwe ari ku rutonde rw'abatemerwa n'ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ONU. Umushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati mu gihugu azoba umugabo atinyitse cane aronderwa na FBI arongoye umugwi w'abagwanyi ba Haqqani. Aba Taliban bigaruriye igihugu nka cose mu ndwi zitatu ziheze, birukanye abari batowe n'abanyagihugu. Itangazwa ry'abagize reta n'intambwe ikomeye igana ku butegetsi bw'aba Taliban.  Ubwo butegetsi buzohangana n'ibibazo bikomeye , hadasigaye inyuma ico gukomeza no guha amaragamo ubutunzi bw'ico gihugu hamwe no kwemerwa mu makungu. Kare aba-Taliban bari bavuze ko bashaka gushinga reta irimwo impande zose . Ariko abashikiranganji bose batangajwe ku wa kabiri basanzwe ari indongozi zizwi z'aba-Taliban , kandi nta mugore n'umwe arimwo. Reta Zunze ubumwe za Amerika zivuga ko ''zifise  impungenge" inyuma y'aho aba Taliban bashiriye ahabona abagize reta yabo y'abashikiranganji b'abagabo gusa kandi irimwo abantu bafitaniye isano n'ibitero ku ngabo z'Abanyamerika. Ubushikirangani bw'imigenderanire bwa Amerika buvga ko buriko burihweza iryo tangazo ryo ku wa kabiri. Umukenguzamateka wa Amerika Lindsey Graham yavuze ko iyo reta mfatakibanza ari umurongo "w'abamenanzugi hamwe  n'abanyamacuniro". N'umwe  mu bakuru b'aba Republicans yiyamirije ingingo bavuga ko "itiyumviriwe neza"  yo kuva muri Afghanistan yafashwe na prezida w'umu Democrat Joe Biden. Mw'itangazo ku wa kabiri, ubushikiranganji bw'imigenderanire (State Department) bwavuze buti: "Twabonye ko urutonde rw'amazina yatangajwe rugizwe gusa n'abasanzwe ari abanywanyi b'aba Taliban canke abo bakorana kandi ata mugore arimwo. "Turatewe impungenge kandi na  kahise ka bamwe bamwe muri bo." Ribandanya rivuga ko ''Amerika izofatira aba-Taliban ku vyo bakora, atari ku majambo." Itangazo rivuga ko Amerika "Izofatira aba-Taliban  ku vyo biyemeje" vyo gutanga inzira itekanye ku banyamahanga n'abanya-Afghanistan bafise ivyangombwa vyo kugira ingendo, harimwo no ''kwemerera indege ubu ziteguriye kuva muri Afghanistan". Ribandanya rivuga riti: ''Twibukije kandi ko twiteze ko aba-Taliban bazokora ibishoboka kugira ubutaka bwa Afghanistan ntibukoreshwe mu kubangamira ibindi bihugu". ''Isi iriko ibirabira hafi."  Itangazo ryitirirwa indongozi kizigenza y'aba-Taliban Mawlawi Hibatullah Akhundzada ryabwiye reta gushira mu ngiro itegeko rya Sharia. Iryo tangazo ryasohotse mu rurimi rw'icongereza rivuga  ko aba-Taliban "bashaka imigenderanire ikomeye kandi imeze neza n'ababanyi n'ibindi bihugu ishingiye ku kwubahana no kuvugana" - ariko harimwo kugabisha ko bazokwubahiriza amategeko n'amasezerano  mpuzamakungu "adateye kubiri n'itegeko rya Islam n'ayandi mateka y'igihugu". Hibatullah Akhundzada ntarigera aboneka ahagaragara. Ubu nibwo butumwa bwa mbere buvuye kuri we bugiye ahabona kuva aba-Taliban bigaruriye ubutegetsi mu kwezi guheze. Hassan Akhund, umushikiranganji wa mbere mushasha w'imfatakibanza , yarabaye umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire kuva mu 1996 gushika mu 2001, igihe uwo mugwi wari ku butegetsi. Azwi cane cane mu burongozi bw'idini muri uwo mugwi kurusha mu ruhande rwa gisirikare. Igenwa ryiwe ribonwa nko guheberanira, inyuma y'ivyavuzwe ko hoba harabaye gusubiranamwo hagati y'indongozi z'aba-Taliban z'umurongo woroshe na bagenzi babo b'umurongo ukaze. Umuvugizi w'aba Taliban, Zabihullah Mujahid, yagize ati:"Turazi ko abanyagihugu bari barindiranye igishika reta nshasha. Turishuye ku cipfuzo c'abo." Sarajuddin Haqqani, umushikiranganji mushasha w'intwaro yo hagati mu gihugu, ni we arongoye umugwi w'abagwanyi uzwi kw'izina rya Haqqani ufitaniye ubucuti n'aba Taliban, ukaba ari na wo uri inyuma y'ibitero vyahitanye abantu benshi muri ico gihugu cari kimaze imyaka 20 mu ntambara. Bitandukanye n'aba Taliban, umuhari wa Haqqani wose wiswe umuhari w'iterabwoba ukorera mu mahanga na Reta zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. Abandi bagenywe harimwo Mullah Yaqoob nk'umushikiranganji wo kwivuna abansi, Amir Khan Muttaqi, uwo imigenderanire n'amakungu hamwe n'abari mu bashinzwe umuhari w'aba Taliban Mullah Abdul Ghani Baradar na Mullah Abdul Salam Hanafi nk'ivyegera. Yaqoob n'umuhungu w'uwashinze uwo muhari akaba yaranabaye umuyobozi wawo wo mu rwego rwo hejuru Mullah Omar. Baradar yigeze gutwara ibiro vy'uwo muhari bijejwe politike, anahagararira ishirwa ry'umukono ku masezerano yo kuva muri ico gihugu na Amerika. Abajijwe impamvu ata mupfasoni n'umwe arimwo, Ahmadullah Wasiq, wo mu mugwi ujejwe imico mu ba Taliban, yabwiye umumenyeshamakuru wa BBC Secunder Kemani ko abagize reta bose bataragenwa.

headline: Intambara yo muri Ukraine: Gusangira icumba n'abapfuye – amahano mu micungararo ya Chernihiv
text: Ku ruhome rutose rw'icumba co munsi c'ishure rya Yahidne hari ikirangaminsi, gicafye n'ingwa itukura. Cerekana  ikiringo c'ihahamuka risiga ubwenge - kuva itariki 5 Ntwarante (ukwezi kwa gatatu) gushika itariki  2 Ndamukiza (ukwa kane) - ku bantu bo muri iki kigwati. Yahidne, ku birometero 140 mu buraruko bwa Kyiv mu nkengera z'igisagara ca Chernihiv cegereye ku rubibe rwa Belarus n'Ubusuriya, carifatiwe n'Abarusiya mu kiringo gishika hafi ukwezi. Igihe binjira, bafashe abagabo, abagore n'abana babakura mu ngo zabo bafatiye inkoho ku gakanu babajana mu cumba co munsi kw'ishure ryo ngaho babamazayo amayinga ane -bashika abantu 130 barundanye mu cumba kingana na metero kwadarato 65 mu bunini (hafi y'imetero 7 kuri 9). Mykola Klymchuk, w'imyaka 60, yari umwe muri bo. Yemeye kuja kutwereka ico cumba co munsi barimwo. Igihe twariko turururuka ingazi nkeya zijayo, twatanguye kwumva umunuko w'indwara n'ukubora. Ico cumba cari gicafuye - imatera, impuzu, ibirato, n'ibitabo vyari vyandagaye hasi, hagati na hagati hari udutanda tune bazinga n'akantu ko kubikamwo ibikoresho vyo mu gikoni mu mfuruka. Mykola yadushikanye hirya ku mpera y'ico cumba. Avuga ati: "Aha hangana na metero imwe nico cari ikibanza canje. Naryama mpagaze." Ijwi ryaranizwe aca atangura kurira. "Nibohera ku mitambikwa nkoresheje igisikafu kugirango simpave ngwa. Namaze amajoro 25 gutyo." Mykola avuga ko atikoma na gato kubera yatinya guhonyora ku bandi. Hari abana bari hagati ya 40 na 50 muri abo bantu bari bagizwe imbohe, harimwo n'inzoya. Uwukiri muto cane yari afise amezi abiri. Ingabo z'Uburusiya zaranyarutse cane mu gukwira ibigwati nka Yahidne igihe zariko ziragaba igitero kuri Chernihiv. Mu kiringo c'amayinga ane, ico gisagara c'abantu 300.000 cari cugaranywe mu gihe ingabo z'Uburisiya zari zagikikuje zigisukako amabombe, ingabo za Ukraine nazo zihagararako. Zaranasambuye ikiraro kw'ibarabara  rija ku murwa mukuru Kyiv, bituma abahaba batagira iyo bashobora guhungira. Ubu abarusiya barahavuye kuko batashoboye gufata Kyiv, BBC yabaye mu binyamakuru vya mbere vyashitse muri ako karere aho agahomerabubnwa k'ivyabaye mu gihe co kuhifatira no gutera amabombe ubu gashobora kwerekanwa. Hafi y'urubibe, abantu bafise umutima uhagaze ko abarusiya  bashobora kugaruka vuba. Anastasiia, w'imyaka 15, yari mu cumba co munsi (basement/sous-sol) muri Yahidne ari kumwe na se na inakuru. Avuga ati: "Nta saganirizo twari dufise. Twabaho duhagaze. Twaryama duhagaze. Ntitwaryama namba. Ntivyashoboka. Iruhande y'aha hose haguma hagwa ibisasu. Kari akaga." Muri ico cumba nta kayaga kahita. Amadirisha abiri yaco yari yazibijwe ibibaho. Mykola ati: "Mu minsi  namaze ngaha, hapfuye abantu 12." Benshi muri bo bari abageze mu zabukuru. Ntibizwi neza icabishe, ariko Mykola yibaza ko vyanse ko bahema gushika aho baruha bagapfa. Iyo hagize abapfa, ibiziga vyabo ntivyaca bivanwa ngaho ubwo nyene. Abasirikare b'Uburusiya ntibavyemera iminsi yose. Kandi kubera intambara yari urutavanako hanze - ibisasu vya muzinga, ibiturika hamwe n'amasasu - kuja hanze kwaba ari ukwiheba. Ivyo bisigura ko abantu, barimwo n'abana, baguma hagati y'ibiziga mu kiringo c'amasaha rimwe na rimwe mbere n'iminsi, gushika bishoboye kujanwa hanze. Anastasiia avuga ati: "Vyari biteye ubwoba cane. Abantu bapfuye nari ndabazi. Badufata neza cane. Narababaye cane. Barapfuye kandi ata mpamvu." "Mu bihe bisanzwe, ntibari kuba bapfuye. Putin akora ivyaha vyo mu ntambara", ivyo navyo bivugwa na Mykola. "Ibirenge vyanje vyari vyatanguye kuvyimba. Ariko naguma nibaza nti, ntegerezwa kumara kabiri. Ntegerezwa, ku neza y'umukobwa wanje n'abazukuru b'abakobwa babiri." Ahanini abantu ntibemererwa kuja ahabona, n'aho hoba kuja ku kazu ka surwumwe (ku musarani). Ahubwo bari basigaye bituma mu ndobo. Mykola ati: "Rimwe na rimwe abasirikare barajana abantu hanze kugira babakoreshe nk'inkinzo." Baremererwa guteka ku mashiga hanze kabiri ku munsi. Ikigwati cari gifise indya zikwiye mu bubiko hamwe n'ikinogo co kuvomamwo amazi. Umwe mu basirikare b'Uburusiya yabwiye Mykola ko bari babwiwe ko muri Ukraine bari kuhamara iminsi itarenga ine, kuko iyo ngo yari kuba ikwiye kugira babe bafashe Kyiv. Itariki 3 Ndamukiza (ukwa 4) abarusiya baravuye muri Yahidne. Abasirikare ba Ukraine ubu bari muri ico kigwati,  ubu benshi mu bari baragizwe imbohe bimuriwe mu tundi turere hafi y'aho. Anastasiia ati: "Mw'ijoro nikangura kenshi cane. Numva umenga ndiko ndumva urwamo rwo kurasa. Nca niruka iyo abavyeyi bari, ubwoba bunyishe." Abarusiya bifatiye ibigwati nka Yahidne bikikuje Chernihiv kugira bugarane ico gisagara hanyuma amaherezo bagifate. Ntibashoboye kwinjira ico gisagara, ariko hasambuwe vyinshi cane mu bice vyinshi vyaco, kandi abategetsi bavuga ko abantu b'abasivire bashika 350 bishwe. Kuva abarusiya bavuye mu micungararo ya Chernihiv, abakorerabushake bariko barahamba abapfuye. Uruhande rumwe rw'akaburi (irimbi) ko ngaho ubu rwuzuye imva nshasha, imwe imwe yose ugasanga ishinzeko ikimenyetso, kugira hamenyekane uwahahambwe. Imiryango yari yaratatanye ija iraza kuraba ko yobona imva z'abayo. Ikibuga c'umupira w'amaguru c'aho caratewe bombe. Ubu hagati mu kibuga hari ikinogo kinini aho iyo bombe yaguye. Iyindi yaguye ku gice kimwe c'aho abantu bicara, ubu hari urusobekerane rw'ibivunji vy'intebe za plastic n'ivyuma vy'uruzitiro. Uvuye kw'ico kibuga, hakurikira icumba c'ibitabo vy'abana cari mu nyubakwa ya kahise nayo yononekaye cane. Igihe twariko turaca muri ico gisagara n'imodoka, twarenganye uduce twinshi tw'aho abantu bahora baba ubu hafi amazu yose asigaye ari hasi. Ahitwa Novoselivka mu buraruko bwa Chernihiv, amaso arakwereka ingene ibintu vyasambuwe. Ibirundo vy'amabuye n'amatafari nivyo biri ahategerezwa kuba hahora amazu. Twabonye agakoti k'imbeho k'umwana gasa na rose, igipupe, inzovu ikozwe mu mpuzu, n'ibivunji vy'ibikinisho vya Lego ku nzira twariko turacamwo tugana aho abantu baba. Kuri iyo nzira twahabonye ibindi binogo vyinshi vyimburuwe n'amabombe. Umugore umwe n'umwana bari ku makinga batugiriye ikimenyetso c'uko twobakurikira. Nina Vynnyk, w'imyaka 62, na Danylo, umwuzukuru wiwe w'umuhungu w'imyaka 10, bashaka kutwereka inzu yabo - ubu isigaye ari igisambasaka, ibintu vyose muri yo n'iruhande yayo vyarasambuwe. Umukobwa wa Nina ari we nyina wa Danylo, Ludmyla w'imyaka 39, yaracitse ukuguru ubu akaba ari mu bitaro. Igihe inzu ya Nina yatangura guterwa amabombe, baciye biruka bahungira ku nzu y'umubanyi bizeye kwiyinyegeza mu cumba co hasi cayo. Ariko nayo yaratewe bombe. Avuga ati: "Twahwikiwe n'ikibombe gituritse. "Umwe yagize igipfupfuri mu mutwe, uwundi arakomereka. Tumaze  gutora ubwenge, naciye mbona umukobwa wanje ariko araboroga, 'Mama, mama nta kuguru mfise'. Vyari biteye ubwoba." Ludmyla yaciye yavura arashika aho ashobora kwikinga hanyuma ajanwa mu bitaro. Nina avuga ati: "Numva  ko ari nko kurazirana ibintu bibi cane. Ntibishobora kuba ari vyo. Kubera iki reta yacu itatugabishije? Kuki bataduhungishije?" Iyo nzu yari igeze ku runganwe rwa kane ibamwo abantu. Ati: "None mu kanya gato, nta na kimwe gisigaye. Sinzi iyo nzoja kuba mu gihe c'ubukonje." Nta buryo afise bwo kurihira umukobwa wiwe ukuguru kw'uguterano. Ku bivugwa n'Ubususiya ko batigeze barondera kugirira nabi abanyagihugu basanzwe, avuga ati: "[Putin] Yuzuye ikinyoma. Hari umugore yacitse ukuguru ubu ari mu bitaro. Ivyo ni ukuri. "Putin ni aze arihe amafaranga yo kumuvuza. Putin naze atwubakire iyi nzu. Yarayishaka cane, si vyo? Ni aze rero ayirihe yose." Andi makuru kuri iyi nkuru yatererewe n'abamenyeshamakuru Imogen Anderson, Anastasiia Levchenko na Daria Sipigina.

headline: Burundi: Abasenyeri gatolika bavuga ko utunenge mu matora bakibaza niba ivyayavuyemwo vyizigirwa
text: Inama nkuru y'Abepiskopi b'I Burundi (CECAB) ivuga ko amatora aheruka yo ku wa 20 z'uku kwa gatanu yaranzwe n'utungenge twinshi twatumye ivyayavuyemwo bibaza niba ari ivyo kwizigira. Mw'itangazo baraye basohoye kuri uyu wa 26/5, abepiskopi 'i Burundi bamenyesha ko barungitse indorerezi 2,716 mu makomine yose, zigashobora kuja ku tuzu tw'amatora batoye. Evariste Ndayishimiye niwe yatangajwe ku vy'agateganyo n'umurwi CENI ujejwe amatora ko yatsinze ayo matora n'amajwi 68%, Agathon Rwasa akaza ubwa kabiri n'amajwi 24%. Umugambwe CNL wa Agathon Rwasa be nawe ubwiwe, ntibemera ivyayavuyemwo. Uwutemera ivyatangajwe na CENI afise umunsi ntarengwa w'uyu munsi ku wa gatatu ngo yiture sentare ijejwe kwubahiriza ibwirizwashingiro. Mw'iryo tangazo, abasenyeri bavuga ko muri rusangi amatora yabaye mw'ituze, ariko y'uko hari utunenge twinshi dushingiye kw'ihonyangwa ry'ubwigenge, ukudafata kumwe abitoza n'abatora. Utunenge abo basenyeri bashira ahabona twashoboye kubonwa n'izo ndorerezi zabo aho zashoboye gushika ni utu: "Igitsure catewe bamwe mu baserukiye abitoza ngo batere igikumu ku mpapuro z'ivyegeranyo vy'ivyavuye mu matora imbere y'uko baharura"; "Amasandugu amwe amwe yashizwemo amakarata y'amajwi arenze (bourrage des urnes)"; "Abatoreye abantu bapfuye be n'impunzi"; "Abantu wasanga bafise amakete yo gutorera abandi menshi, ivyo navyo bitemewe". "Mu tuzu tw'amatora tumwe tumwe hari abantu batoye incuro zirenga imwe". "Hari abaserukiye abitoza be n'indorerezi birukanywe mu guharura amajwi". "Hari bamwe mu batora bakorewe iterabwoba baterwa n'igitsure na bamwe mu bategetsi banabaherekeza no mu bwiherero". "Abantu batemewe n'amategeko biyadukiza bakinjira mu bibanza vyo guharuriramwo amajwi". "Gutora mw'ibanga bitubahirijwe". "Bamwe mu bahagarikizi baratswe impapuro zibaha uburenganzira bwo guhagararira amatora banakwa n'amaterefone yabo". Abo basenyeri gatorika mu Burundi babona ko utwo tunenge dutuma bibaza niba ivyari vyitezwe gutangazwa vyizigirwa. Babona kandi ko hari abariko barahohotera canke bashaka guturubika ababanyi babo inyuma y'aya matora, babahora ko badasangiye ivyiyumviro, bagasaba abategetsi guhana abo bantu. Bati: "Mu gihe amategeko yemera ko haba abahiganwa benshi, buri munyagihugu yari afise uburenganzira bwo kwerekana uwo yipfuza gushigikira". Abo basenyeri basaba ko uwumva ko yarenganijwe yokwirinda gukoresha imigumuko, agaca mu nziza y'ubutungane kugira ngo atunganirizwe. Mu matora atatu yabaye kuwa gatatu uheze, ihiganwa ryari rikomeye ryari hagati y'umugambwe CNDD-FDD uri ku butegetsi hamwe na CNL utavuga rumwe nawo. Imigambwe imwe n'abandi bitoje ku giti cabo ku mwanya w'umukuru w'igihugu baremeye ivyavuye mu matora n'ubwo banenze utunenge tumwe tumwe twibonekeje. Hagati aho, umugambwe CNL uvuga ko amatora yabayemwo ubusuma, ukavuga ko washoboye kwegeranya ivyegeranyo vy'amatora vyerekana ko ari wo wayatsinze. Domitien Ndayizeye witoza ashizwe imbere n'urunani Kira Burundi, yabwiye BBC utunenge yabonye twabaye mu matora, ariko avuga ko "igihe uwatowe azoba amaze kwemezwa na CENI ubwa nyuma nta kizomubuza gutwara Uburundi". Umugwi CENI ujejwe gutegura amatora wowo wemeza ko amatora yagenze neza. Sentare ijejwe kwubahiriza ibwirizwashingiro utegerezwa kumenyesha ibiharuro ntabanduka vyayavuyemwo ku wa 04 z'ukwa gatandatu.

headline: Uganda: Uwigize umuhanuzi w'idini yakubise abayoboke yapfunzwe
text: Umugabo wo muri Uganda yigize umuhanuzi w'idini yagirijwe ivyaha vyo guhohotera no gukora urudandaza rw'abantu. Umuhanuzi Kintu Dennis w’ishengero Hoima Empowerment Church International yabonetse muri video yarabwe cane ariko arakubita inkoni abayoboke b’ishengero ryiwe. Igipolisi cafashe uwo mugabo w’imyaka 42 kuwa gatatu w’ino ndwi ari kumwe n’abandi bayoboke b’iryo shengero bane nyuma y’aho iyo video yitwariwe. Afatwa amasanamu ariko arategeka abakozi bo mw’ishengero ngo baje imbere y’isengero bakubitwe canke bahebe kugaruka mu masengesho bace banatakaza amahirwe yo gukora kuri microphone yiwe. Ico gihe cose, abaje gusenga bagumye barorera mu gihe abo bakozi baza barakubitwa umwe inyuma y’uwundi hariko haravuga akaziki koroheje ka piano. Umuhanuzi Kintu yabariye abakora itohoza ko yariko arasubiramwo ivyo Yezu yakoze, igihe yasanga abantu bariko baradandariza mw’isengero, nk’uko biri mu rwandiko rw’igipolisi. Abajejwe intwaro kandi bavuga yuko yayobora iryo shengero atavyemerewe n’amategeko. Ugusaka kwakozwe m’iryo sengero kwatoye inkoni zitatu igipolisi kivuga yuko ari zo zakoreshwa mu gukubita abayoboke. Kintu Dennis yagumijwe mw’ibohera gushika itari indwi Nyakanga (9). Uganda ifise amashengero menshi ya gi-Kristu akorera hose mu gihugu. Ntagenzurwa kandi menshi muri yo atwarwa n’abagabo canke abagore biyita intumwa z’Imana.

headline: Umugambi wa UK wo kurungika abimukira mu Rwanda uteye kubiri 'na kamere y'Imana' - Welby
text: Umukuru w'ishengero ry'Ubwongereza (Church of England), Justin Welby, kuri uyu wa Mungu yaneguye umugambi wa Reta y'Ubwongereza wo kurungika mu Rwanda abarondera ubuhungiro. Uyu Musenyeri mukuru wa Canterbury avuga ko uwu mugambi "uteye kubiri na kamere y'Imana". Mu nyigisho yiwe ya Pasika, Justin Welby yavuze ko igihe c'izuka rya Yesu Kristu/Yesu Kristo atari ico "kuremeka inshingano zacu abandi". Reta ivuga ko ari ngombwa ko haba impinduka kugira bakingire ubuzima bw'abantu ntibagurishwe.l Muri uwu mugambi w'imiriyoni 120 z'amapadundi (hafi imiriyoni 157 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika)  - watangajwe muri ino ndwi - abantu bafatwa ko binjiye mu Bwongereza bidaciye mu mategeko bazotwarwa muri iki gihugu c'Urwanda, ari ho bazokwemererwa gusabira uburenganzira bwo kuja kuba muri ico gihugu. Iyi ngingo iriyamirizwa bikomeye, aho amashirahamwe atabara abatishoboye arenga 160 ariko asaba abashikiranganji guhagarika ico bita poritike "y'ubugome". Eka n'imigambwe itavuga rumwe n'uwuri ku butegetsi mu Bwongereza na bamwe mu bagendera ku vyiyumviro vya kera (Conservatives) baranegura iyi ngingo. Mw'ijambo yashikirije ku Rusengero rukuru rwa Canterbury kuri uno musi wa Mungu wa Pasika, Musenyeri Welby yavuze ko  hari "ibibazo bikomeye bitewe n'irungikwa ry'abasaba ubuhungiro mu mahanga". Yongerako ati: "Ibisigaye ni ivya poritike n'abanyaporitike. Ica ngenderwako n'uko vyoba ari vyiza mu maso y'Imana. Ariko siko bimeze. " ...kandi ntibihuye n'inshingano zacu nk'igihugu kigendera ku ndangagaciro k'aba-Kristu: kuko kuremeka abandi inshingano zacu, naho hoba ari ku gihugu kirondera ineza nk'Urwanda, ni igihushane ca kamere k'Imana, kuko yo nyene ubwayo yaremeye kwiremeka ibitunanira". Ubushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati yashigikiye uwu mugambi bufatiye ku majambo yo kunegura yavuzwe n'uyu musenyeri, bukavuga ko Ubwongereza "bwishimira kahise kabwo" ko gufasha abo bose babikeneye, kandi ko n'imigambi yo guha ubuhungiro ababukeneye wafashije ibihumbi amajana n'amajana kuronka "inzira nziza kandi zemewe n'amategeko zo kwubaka kazoza kabo". Umuvugizi w'ubwo bushikiranganji avuga ati: "Hagati aho, isi irahanzwe n'ikibazo c'abimukira ku rugero rutari bwigere rubaho rero hakenewe impinduka kugira ngo abantu babi bashora abantu bareke gushira ubuzima bw'abantu mu kaga hanyuma n'ikibazo c'abarondera ubuhungiro kw'isi cananiraye gitorerwe umuti". Ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati buvuga ko Urwanda "rutekanye" kandi ko ruzokwiga abasaba ubuhungiro hisunzwe amategeko mpuzamakungu akingira uburenganzira bwa kiremwamuntu. Amasendika y'abakozi ba reta avuga ko iyi ngingo ari "iy'ubunyamaswa" ariko ko abategetsi bazotegerezwa kuyishira mu ngiro canke naho bakagenda. Ku wa kane, Ubwongereza n'Urwanda vyashize ahabona amasezerano mashasha azotuma bamwe mu barondera ubuhungiro bazoronswa gusa itike y'indege yo kugenda bakaja muri ico gihugu.
