headline: Papa Francis: Gatolika yakoze amakosa mu "gucinyiza imico y'abandi"
text: Umwungere wa Elkeziya Gatolika, Papa Francis, yavuze ko iryo shengero ryakoze amakosa mu gushimikira ku muco umwe gusa, rimwe na rimwe hakanakoreshwa inguvu mu gushika ku mugambi waryo Papa yavuze yuko ivyo vyahombeje Ishengero ubutunzi butandukanye bwo mu mico n'imigenzo myinshi. Yavuze yuko inyigisho z'ishengero zerekanye yuko hakwiye kwubahirizwa "inkomoko y'umuco n'akaranga vya buri muntu." Ivyo Papa Francis yabivugiye mu mubonano rusangi uba buri wa gatati i Vaticano. Abivuze mu gihe hari umwidogo ku mugabane wa Amerika y'ubumanuko ku vyagizwe igihe Espagne yigarurira ico gice c'isi ikanashira mu bukoroni ba kavukire baho. Kuwa kabiri umukuru w'igisagara ca Mexico mu gihugu ca Mexique yavuze yuko igishusho c'umugore kavukire kizosubirira ica Christopher Columbus (afatwa nk'uwatoye aho umugabane wa Amerika uri) muri kimwe mu bice bikomeye vy'uwo muji.

headline: Papa Francis ati: 'Imana idukunda twese, n’aho woba uri umunyakibi ruhebwa'
text: Papa Francis yahimbaje umunsi mukuru wa Noel avuga ko Imana idukunda twese - "Ninkozi z'ibibi ruhebwa". Yashikirije iryo jambo imbere y'abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bari mu gisabisho c'ijoro rya Noel kw'isengero rikuru i Vaticano ryitiriwe Umutakatifu Petero. Ati: "Ufise kuba  uri mu vyiyumviro bibi, ufise kuba warakoze ibi ruhebwa…ariko Imana ibandanya igukunda". Hari bamwe babona ko yashikirije ayo majambo afatiye ku mabi yagirizwa bamwe mu barongoye Ekleziya Katolika, harimwo ibijanye n'ugufata ku nguvu, nk'uko bishikirizwa n'umumenyeshamakuru wa BBC. Mu masaha yo ku mugoroba, Papa Francis aza gusubira mw'iyo sengero y'Umutakatifu Petero i Vaticano aho nk'uko vyama aza gushikiriza isi yose ijambo rya Papa risanzwe ryitezwe. Mu bitavye iyo misa harimwo abana batowe mu bihugu, harimwo nka za Venezuela, Irak na Uganda. Umumenyeshamakuru wa BBC i Roma, Mark Lowen, avuga ko vyerekana ko Papa afise ku mutima abakatolika baharurwa mu muliyaridi 1 n'ibice bitatu kw'isi, ashimikiye cane cane ku ngorane zihanze abimukira n'abari mu ntambara kw'isi yose. Uyo mu papa w'imyaka 83 akomoka muri Argentine yavuze ati: "Noel itwibutsa ko Imana ibandanya itwereka urukundo idufitiye, n'aho twoba turi abanyavyaha ruhebwa. Kuri jewe, ku muntu uwo ari we wese, uno munsi itubwira iti: 'Ndagukunda kandi nzokwama ndagukunda, kuko mu maso yanje uri ngirakamaro'". Imana ntigukunda kubera wiyumvira ugakora ivyiza. Igukunda ataco irabiyeko, vyonyene gusa. Urukundo rwayo ntiruva ku kungene umeze". Papa yanacishijemwo n'ibijanye n'amabi avugwa muri Ekleziya, hamwe n'isesagurwa ry'umutungo wa Ekleziya. Ati: "Nimba hari ibitagenda neza mu buzima bwacu, nimba hari ibitagenda neza muri Ekleziya, n'aho hoba ibibazo bimeze gute kw'isi, ivyo ntibizotubera inyendamuvano". Kuva mu bisagara vya Australia gushika mu mashure muri Irlande eka mbere no mu bisagara vya Amerika, Ekleziya Katolika yarahuye n'ibibazo vy'abayirongoye bagirizwa gufata ku nguvu abana kuva mu myaka mirongo iheze. Hari ibirego bikomeye n'abantu batanga ivyemezo vy'ivyo vyaha vyavuzwe cane mu matohoza abandanya akorwa. Mu biheruka, umukardinali wa Australia George Pell yarakubiswe intahe mu gahanga na sentare ko yafashe ku nguvu uduhungu tubiri two mu gisagara ca Melbourne muri Australia mu 1996. Uyo mukardinali yanahoze ajejwe ubutunzi i Vaticano - bisigura ko yaboneka nk'umutegetsi agira gatatu muri Ekleziya - niwe mutegetsi mukuru wa Ekleziya muri Australia yagirijwe ico caha. Mu ndwi iheze, Papa yarakoze impinduka zikomeye cane mu guhindura ibijanye "n'ibanga ry'ubupapa" ryatumye ivyo guhohotera abana vyakorwa n'abategetsi ba Ekleziya bisasirwa indava muri kahise. Imbere y'aho, Ekleziya yaragira ibanga ibijanye n'ugufata abana ku nguvu, mu vyafatwa ko kwari ukugerageza kugumiriza ibanga ababikorewe n'ababikoze. Ariko, ingingo nshasha yarakuyeho izo nzitizi zahora zibuza abantu kumenyesha ivyababayeko, canke ababibakoreye. Papa Francis agize iminsi atoroherezwa kuko hari benshi bamusaba gufata ingingo ruhasha kugira ngo arwanye ako kabi kiziziye Ekleziya muri ino myaka ya vuba.

headline: Lionel Messi afise indoto yo gutsindira Ligue des Champions muri Paris St-Germain
text: Lionel Messi avuga ko afise indoto yo gusubira gutsindira Ligue des Champions/Champions League inyuma y'aho ashikiye muri Paris St-Germain, akongerako ati: "Nibaza ko hano dufise umurwi ushobora kubishikako". Uyu mukinyi rurangiranwa w'imyaka 34 ari na we kizigenza w'umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Argentina, yatsindiye Ligue des Champions incuro zine muri Barcelona, iyo aheruka ikaba ari iyo mu 2015. PSG iracarwana ngo itahukane ku ncuro ya mbere iri higanwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere ku mugabane wa Buraya, mw'ihiganwa rya 2020 ikaba yatsinzwe na Bayern Munich mu rukino rwa nyuma. Igihe yerekanwa nk'umukinyi wa PSG, Messi yavuze ati: "Intumbero n'indoto vyanje ni uko nosubira gutahukana Ligue des Champions". Messi yavuye muri Barcelona yari yinjiyemwo afise imyaka 13 inyuma y'aho uwu murwi wa La Liga unaniriwe no guha ayandi masezerano uyu mukinyi kubera inzitizi zishingiye ku mategeko ajanye n'ikoreshwa ry'amafaranga muri iryo higanwa. Nk'umwe mu bakinyi b'ibihangange baranze amateka y'umupira w'amaguru, Messi yinjije ibitsindo 672 mu nkino 778 yakiniye uwu murwi rurangiranwa w'i Catalan. Yaraciye umuhigo mu gutsindira umupira w'inzahabu (Ballon d'Or) incuro zitandatu, aterura n'ibikombe 35 mu gihe cose yari amaze i Nou Camp, ariko avuga ko ubu aryohewe no gutangura ibihe bishasha mu buzima bwiwe, inyuma y'aho aviriye muri Barcelona "bigoranye". Ari i Parc des Princes (ikibuga ca PSG), yabwiye abanyamakuru ati: "Yari impinduka igoye cane inyuma y'igihe kirekire cane".  "Ariko maze gushika hano, numvise mfise umunezero mwinshi cane kandi ndipfuza gutangura imyimenyerezo vuba bwango. Nshaka kwihuta". "Ikintu conyene nshaka ubu ni ugutangura imyimenyerezo. Ndashaka gukorana n'abakinyi bagenzanje hamwe n'abakozi, kugira ngo ntangure iki gihe gishasha mu buzima bwanje". "Ndafise iri shaka ryo gukina. Numva ndiko ndaribwaribwa. Numva ngishaka gutsinda nk'uko nabikoze mu gihe ca mbere c'umwuga wanje". "Ndumva ko uwu murwi witeguriye kurwanira ibikombe vyose. Ni ryo hangiro ryanje, nshaka kubandanya ntera imbere ngatsindira ibikombe, iki nico catumye nza muri uno murwi". Kuzana Messi muri uno murwi usanzwe urimwo ibihangange ni intambwe ikomeye kuri PSG mu rugamba rwo kurondera kuba kw'isonga mu mupira w'amaguru i Buraya. Inyuma yo gutsindwa na Manchester City mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma mu mwaka w'inkino uheze, mu nyuma igatakaza Ligue 1 yo mu Bufaransa yatsindiwe na Lille, PSG yaronse abakinyi bamaze gutahukana Ligue des Champions, nka Sergio Ramos, Georginio Wijnaldum na Messi. Ariko, Messi arazi neza ko, kugira ngo aterure igikombe ca Ligue des Champions ku ncuro igira gatanu, bishobora gushika agahura na Barcelona, kandi aremera ko gukina i Nou Camp yambaye umwambaro wa PSG vyoba ari ibintu "bigoye cane  kwumva". Yongerako ati: "Barcelona ni muhira kuri jewe - nabayeyo kuva ndi umwana muto kandi nahakoreye ibintu vyinshi cane. "Sinzi ko tuzohura nabo - ariko vyoba biryoshe cane gusubira i Barcelona. "Vyoba ari ibintu bigoye kwumva gukina muhira i Barcelona ndi mu wundi mwambaro ariko birashoboka, reka tuzoraba". Umuzo wa Messi ku mugwa mukuru w'Ubufaransa utumye PSG iba umwe mu mirwi ifise umurongo ukomeye cane w'abasatirizi kw'isi mu mateka y'umupira w'amaguru. Uyu mukinyi agiye gukina ku ruhande rw'abasatirizi muri PSG ari kumwe n'abakinyi babiri bazimvye kurusha abandi mu bihe vyose vyabayeho, aba nabo bakaba ari Neymar bahoze bakinana muri Barcelona, hamwe na Kylian Mbappe. Umukuru wa PSG Nasser Al-Khelaifi aremeza ko kugura Messi bizotuma uwu murwi ushobora kugumana Mbappe, mu gihe amasezerano asanzwe afitaniye nawo azorangira mu 2022. Al-Khelaifi ati: "Yahora yipfuza umurwi ushobora guhiganwa, ubu ndibaza ko dufise umurwi wa mbere ukomeye cane kw'isi, rero nta citwazo ubu afise - nta kindi yokora atari kuguma hano". Avuga ku bijanye n'uko umurwi ukoresha amafaranga y'umurengera, Al-Khelaifi yongeyeko ati: "Ico mwebwe nk'abanyamakuru mukwiye kwibandako gusumba ibindi ni ukuraba iciza azaniye uno murwi hakwibanda ku bintu bibi". "Twabanje kuvugana n'abaduha amafaranga kandi twari tuzi ko dushobora kumuzana. Muri ivyo vyose, twabanje kuraba ko tutorenza urugero mw'ikoreshwa ry'amahera, kandi tuzokurikiza amategeko ngenderwako mw'ikoreshwa ryiza ry'amafaranga".

headline: Sead Kolasinac wa Arsenal yarwanye n'abasuma babiri
text: Umukinyi w'umupira w'amaguru wo muri Bosnia akiniria ikipe ya Arsenal, ariko aritwa intwari ku mbuga hwaniro nyuma yo kugaragara atana mu mitwe n'abasuma babiri. Abo basuma bari biyoberanije bashaka kwiba imodoka izimvye uwo mukinyi na mugenzi wiwe bari barimwo. Sead Kolasinac yari atwawe mu modoka na rurangiranwa w'Umudage, Mesut Ozil, bari i London igihe ivyo vyaba. Video yagaragaye yerekana Kolasinac ata kirwanisho afise, ahangana n'abasuma babiri bari bambaye inkofero z'abagira kw'ipikipiki. Abo basuma kandi bari bitwje imbukiga, ariko nticabujije Kolasinac kubatesha bagata bakomoka. Ikipe ya Arsenal ivuga ko abo bakinyi bose bameze neza kandi ko ata n'umwe yakomeretse, igipolisi kikaba kiriko kirakora itohoza.

headline: Ayavugwa mw’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi: De Jong, Werner, Fofana, Barnes, Firmino, Gueye
text: Chelsea igiye kurondera umukinyi akina hagati wa Barcelona umunya-Hollande Frenkie de Jong w’imyaka 25, kandi mu gihe yoramuka avuye Nou Camp, uyu murwi wo muri Espagne ushobora guca urondera umukinyi wo hagati wa Manchester City, umunya-Portugal Bernardo Silva w’imyaka 27. (Sport – mu ki Espagnol) Umumenyereza wa Barcelona  Xavi avuga ko atazi nimba De Jong, asanzwe aronderwa cane na Manchester United, azoguma muri uyo murwi w’ihiganwa ry’umupira w’amaguru rya Espagne, La Liga, muri rino ci. (Metro) Chelsea iriko iragerageza kurondera umukinyi w’inyuma wa Leicester City umufaransa Wesley Fofana w’imyaka 21,hamwe n’umunya-Hollande akina inyuma na we nyene Denzel Dumfries w’imyaka 26 asanzwe akinira  Inter Milan. (Athletic). Chelsea yemeye guha Real Madrid yo muri Espagne umusatirizi w’umudagi Timo Werner  w’imyaka 26. (Marca) Newcastle United iriko irakurikirana umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Leicester City umwongereza Harvey Barnes w’imyaka 24, inyuma y’aho uyu murwi uzwi nka Foxes wankiye igiciro yari yemeye gutanga kuri mugenziwe James Maddison w’imyaka 25 akina hagati. (Mail) Umusatirizi wa Liverpool Roberto Firmino araronderwa na Juventus ariko uyu munya-Brezili w’imyaka 30 avuga ko yipfuza kwigumira i Anfield. (Liverpool Echo) Umukinyi w’inyuma, umunya-Hollande Virgil van Dijk w’imyaka 31 avuga ko mugenziwe bakinana muri Liverpool, Mohamed Salah w’imyaka 30 ashobora kuba yaragizweko ingaruka n’ibiganiro ku vyerekeye amasezerano yiwe mu mwaka w’inkino uheze, ariko ko ubu “akina ata bibazo biri mu mutwe” inyuma yo gutera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha. (Liverpool Echo) Everton irabandanya ibiganiro na Paris St-Germain mu ntumbero yo guheraheza amasezerano azotuma umunya-Senegal akina hagati Idrissa Gueye w'imyaka 32, asubira muri Goodison Park. (Times) Manchester United iriko iraraba ingene yoronka umusatirizi wa Stuttgart umunya-Autriche Sasa Kalajdzic w’imyaka 25, be n’umunya Slovenia Benjamin Sesko w’imyaka 19 akina imbere muri Red Bull Salzburg, mu gihe kazoza ka Cristiano Ronaldo i Old Trafford kadatomoye. (Mail) Umukinyi w’inyuma ku ruhande rw’ibubamfu muri RB Leipzig Angelino w’imyaka 25, ni we ashobora kuvuvudukirwa na Barcelona mu gihe yonanirwa no kugura mugenziwe wa Espagne Marcos Alonso w’imyaka 31 asanzwe akinira Chelsea. (Sport – muki Espagnol) Umuyobozi nshingwabikorwa wa Bayern Munich Oliver Kahn yari aherutse kuvuga ko umusatirizi wa Tottenham umwongereza Harry Kane yari "indoto ya kazoza ", avuga ko uyu murwi wo mu Budagi ata mugambi ufise wo kugura uyu musatirizi. (90 Min) Roma yarondeye umusatirizi w’umutaliyano Andrea Belotti w’imyaka 28, asanzwe yirebanga inyuma yo kuva muri Turin/Torino muri rino ci. (Football Italia)

headline: Ronaldo ntazokurikiranwa ku caha co "gufata ku nguvu"
text: Rurangiranwa mu mupira w'amaguru, Cristiano Ronaldo, ntazokurikiranwa nyuma yo kwagirizwa guhohotera bifatiye ku gitsina, nk'uko bitangazwa n'abashinjacaha muri Amerika. Kathryn Mayorga w'imyaka 34, yari yavuze ko uwo mukinyi wa Juventus yamusambanije ku nguvu mw'ihoteri i Las Vegas mu 2009. Bivugwa ko yashitse ku mwumvikano udaciye muri sentare n'uwo rurangiranwa wo muri Portugal mu 2010, ariko asaba ko urubanza rwosubira kwugururwa mu 2018. Ronaldo ahakana ivyo yagirizwa. Mu rwandiko rwasohowe kuwa mbere, abashinjacaha b'i Las Vegas bavuze ko ivyo uwo mugore avuga "bidashobora kwemezwa ata gukekeranya." Umwanditsi wa sentare yavuze ko uwo arega yavuze ko yahotewe mu 2009, ariko yanka kuvuga aho vyabereye canke uwamuhohoteye uwo ari we. Ngo ku bw'izo mvo rero igipolisi nticashoboye "gukora itohoza iryo ari ryo ryose ryogira ishingiro." Mu kwezi kw'umunani 2018, igipolisi c'i Las Vegas cakoze irindi tohoza bisabwe n'uwo avuga ko yahohotewe. Igitangazamakuru co mu Budage, Der Spiegel, nico catangaje ubwa mbere iyo nkuru mu mwaka uheze. Cavuze ko mu 2010 uwo mugore yashitse ku mwumvikano bidaciye muri sentare na Ronaldo, aho yahawe amahera $375,000, yemera ko atazokwigera avuga ivyo vyagiriji ku mugaragaro. Uwunganira Madamu Mayorga mu vy'amategeko yavuze ko yahawe ingoga zo kuvyutsa uru rubanda n'isekeza rya #MeToo, rirwanya ihohoterwa ry'abagore. Ronaldo ntiyahakanye ko yahuye n'uwo mugore i Las Vegas mu 2009, ariko avuga ko ivyabaye hagati yabo vyari ku gushaka kwa bose. Ico gihe Ronaldo yari agikinira Manchester United, agomba aje muri Real Madrid, aho yamaze imyaka icenda yakurikiye.

headline: Umunonotsi Francine Niyonsaba avuga ko atawuzomubuza guhiganwa
text: Umunonotsi w'Umurundikazi, Francine Niyonsaba, ahiganwa mu gusiganwa imetero 800, yabwiye BBC ko ata n'umwe ashobora kumubuza kubandanya ahiganwa. Ibi ni nyuma y'aho urwego mpuzamakungu rujejwe inkino zo kunonora imitsi rutegekeye ko abagore bafise imisemburo ya kigabo irenze urugero mu mubiri, bagomba gufata imiti iyigabanya. Mu banonotsi iyo ngingo iraba harimwo Francine Niyonsaba hamwe na Caster Semenya wo muri Afrika y'epfo, ariko iyo ngingo yajanywe muri sentare. Avugana na BBC mu gihe ikinyamakuru Forbes giheruka kumushira ku rutonde rw'abagore 30 bahambaye muri Afrika, Francine yavuze ko azobandanya ahiganwa mu kunonora imitsi, uko vyogenda kwose. Yavuze ko iyo ngingo yo gushaka kubakumira irimwo akarenganyo gakomeye. Francine avuga ko icatumye agira ishaka ryo kurondera ari uko yakuriye mu buzima bugoye. Yagize ati: "Jewe nakuze mpabwa ibintu bike mu buzima, nakuriye mu muryango ukenye. Sinaronse amahirwe yo kubana n'abavyeyi bose, ivyo rero vyarankujije mu mutwe." "... ndabona yuko ntegerezwa kurwana n'ubuzima. Umuvyeyi wanje nawe nyene yarampaye icitegererezo gikomeye kuri we kuko yarambwira ati 'mwana mu buzima ntacoroshe..." Francine yabaye Umurundi agira kabire muri kahise k'ico gihugu yaronse umudari mu nkino Olempike, aho yaronka umudari w'umwakaka mu nkino zo mu 2016 muri Brezil, mu kwiruka imetero 800. Uwundi ni Venuste Niyongabo, yaronse umudari w'inzahabu mu gusiganwa imetero 1500 mu nkino Olempike z'i Atlanta muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu 1996. Ku ngingo y'uko yobuzwa guhiganwa kubera ico kibazo c'imisemburo, Francine yagize ati "Nifuza yuko umwanya nkifise hano kw'isi abantu batovuga ngo harabaye ntihakabe, bovuga bati harabaye harakaba." Ushobora gukurikirana ikiganiro Francine Niyonsaba yagiranye na BBC ukanze ngaha.
